Other Town / ashley-laurier
Ehn/PC 12/3/2022 8:59 PM
Ashley woke up in her own bed the next morning. A white cat stood on top of her, before opening it’s mouth. "Good morning!" ((End session))
Ehn/PC 12/4/2022 7:43 PM
((Saturday))
1
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 2:07 PM
"Good morning!"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 2:11 PM
Ashley looks up past where the cat is sitting on her chest. The voice doesn't sound familiar, but maybe she's just tired...? She looks around her room to try and find the origin of it. She could've sworn it came from nearby. Wait, 'her room'? She feels a rush of apprehension. Did the Petersons take her back to her house after they found her sleeping on the couch...? (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 2:17 PM
The room is empty aside from the cat. "It’s me!" The cat.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 2:21 PM
Slowly, Ashley turns to the cat again, the gears in her mind turning as she processes it as the source of the voice. Then she lets out a yelp and instinctively lurches away from it, falling off her bed and hitting her head on the floor. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 2:23 PM
Ashley goes right through the cat somehow. "Yikes. One of the more extreme reactions, for sure."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 2:24 PM
She looks up at it and lets out a noise that can't fully be described as either a laugh or a whimper. "Wh- Wh- I- Th- Wh-"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 2:32 PM
"I am Ehn!"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 2:34 PM
"A-Am I dreaming right now?? Ahaha, yeah, that's gotta be it... Okay, calm down, it's just a dream." Ashley takes a deep breath in and out, then stands up from her awkward position on the floor, still rubbing her head. Would her head be hurting this much in a dream? She decides not to think too hard about it. "Um... hi...?"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 2:40 PM
"Nope, this is as real as it gets for you!"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 2:43 PM
She giggles nervously, sweating as she tries to mentally brush the cat's words aside. After all, it's not impossible that something in a dream could try to convince her that it's real. That's the thing with dreams, always so realistic-seeming until you wake up. Just like her last one. "Well, er... Whether this is a dream or not, what are you doing in my room? I don't think we've met before..."
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 2:46 PM
"Nope! But we're meeting now for a little gift!"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 2:46 PM
"A... gift?"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 2:49 PM
"A power beyond your wildest imagination! I will grant you a superhuman ability, which you can use to enact your idea of good onto the world. Sounds pretty fun, right?"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 2:52 PM
She stands there in shock for a moment. "Huh. Yeah, that would be really nice... If I really did have some kind of special power like that, I can't even begin to name all the things I'd do with it."
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 2:55 PM
"Good! The more you do, the more fun it is, y'know? But in exchange, I will ask for a favor from you!"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 2:59 PM
"Well, if I've got superpowers, I'm sure your favor'll be no problem at all. What did you have in mind?"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 3:01 PM
"Oh, I dunno yet. It's just an agreement for the deal. I'll call you for it when I need it."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 3:10 PM
That seems a little strange. "You sure? I mean, giving a superpower away with just an agreement to do a favor later seems really generous… What if I find out your favor is something I can't fulfill later on after I've already agreed to it? Are you sure I'm even going to have another dream about you?"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 3:18 PM
"You're not dreaming, sheesh. And of course I know you can complete it, that's why I picked you! You've gotta be the best person in this town!"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 3:24 PM
Ashley raises her eyebrows in surprise. "W-Well, if you're that sure, I guess I can believe you. And I'm flattered by your faith in how good of a person I am, really. I mean, I can definitely think of someone who's better in every way, haha, but I'm certainly trying my best to live up to them."
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 3:30 PM
"What, Autumn? Nahhhh! You're way better than her! Trust me, I know everything!"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 3:39 PM
"Hey. I'm happy you think I'm good enough to take your superpower deal, but Autumn's better than you think she is. She might come off as cold or heartless, but she does everything for the greater good. Maybe you know everything she does, but have a little more faith in her than that." (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 3:42 PM
"No way! What kind of person operating for the greater good leaves you so miserable? None! She's done nothing for you, but you've done everything for her! What you need is a fair deal. Like ours."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 3:45 PM
Ashley tenses up. "That's... that's just because I'm being selfish. It's not her fault."
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 3:54 PM
"Selfish? It seems pretty selfless to me! You're just getting all your 'morality' info from the wrong people. The internet? Autumn? Nah, what you need is me! The objective arbiter of the universe."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 4:01 PM
"Aren't you a cat?" (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 4:02 PM
"No! Ugh, why does everyone keep saying that? Do cats have magic powers and move through objects like a ghost? Because some of you have seen some weird cats if so. I am Ehn!"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 4:08 PM
"I thought that was-" Ashley holds herself back from saying 'a dream' again; it'd clearly just irritate the creature more. Maybe it'd just be best to go along with what it was saying for now, since after all, it was claiming it could grant her superpowers. "Yeah, my mistake. Sorry for assuming like that."
4:08 PM
"But back to what we were originally talking about, what kind of power would I get?"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 4:10 PM
"Oh, uh... I dunno. You aren't really supposed to exist. …Within my radar. Being an accident is a different thing thing that is also true, but not what I was referencing. Anyway, I didn't really come with any inspiration. Any ideas?"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 4:26 PM
An accident? Ashley wondered what that could mean for a second, but that thought was quickly swept aside by the much more important matter. "You mean I get to pick??" she asked incredulously, her mind already racing with possibilities. "And if I'd only get to choose one, well... that's tough..." She started pacing around the room. "If I had to pick what would be the most helpful though, hm. The power to stop time? Or read other people's minds? Ooh, mind reading could be helpful. On that note, mind control might be nice too, or moving objects with my mind. Maybe teleportation? ....Actually, what if I could save and load in real life, like a video game? Yeah, I'd want that! That's perfect!"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 4:32 PM
"You mean like time travel? I dunno could get pretty chaotic… Sounds more confusing than fun."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 4:37 PM
"Well, think about it. If I had to make any tough decision, I could just save right before it! If I ended up regretting the way I went about it, I could just go back to it and do it again the right way. I wouldn't ever have to worry about not being able to help someone again, because if something went wrong, I'd always be able to fix it!"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 4:38 PM
Ehn looks bored at this, and just yawns. "That’s such a lame use of a power. You’re still stuck within your normal limits for helping a person. How about this. Invisibility. That hasn’t been used. Pretty cool right?"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 4:39 PM
Ashley tilts her head. "Would invisibility really let me help someone better?"
4:43 PM
"I dunno. The way I see it, knowledge is power. If I'm just turning invisible, that's not going to let me communicate with anyone- it just means they wouldn't see me. I want a power that lets me know more about other people, so I can figure out the right choices to make. If time travel and mind reading don't work, what about seeing the future?"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 4:47 PM
"Seeing the future? The future doesn’t exist yet, though. You’d just be looking at an empty void."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 4:49 PM
"Oh, I thought it'd work differently from that..." She sighs. "Uh, what about lie detection, where I could instantly tell whether anything is a lie or the truth?"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 4:55 PM
"Nah. I’ll just do invisibility, it’s my choice anyway. Trust me, this’ll be way better."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 4:59 PM
Ashley pouts a little. "Not much of a choice then... Is there really nothing else you have in mind that could work?" (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 5:07 PM
"Honestly, it doesn’t really matter what you want. It’s all really just up to what I’m feeling at the moment. And the main city ran through all the fun options anyway."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 5:08 PM
"I have no idea what you're talking about, but fine." She throws up her hands in defeat. "Invisibility's better than nothing, I guess."
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 5:16 PM
"Okay, let me just find it…" She begins searching around.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 5:36 PM
She stopped at one of Ashley's jackets. "It's this one."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 5:38 PM
"...? That's... a jacket."
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 5:39 PM

Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 5:40 PM
"What do you mean? Like an invisibility jacket or something?"
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 5:45 PM
"Yeah! My powers are stored in items, so don't let this one be stolen."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 5:48 PM
"Huh, alright." This really IS a weird dream... Where did my brain get the idea of a superpower that takes form like this? "I'm pretty great at keeping track of things, so I think I've got that covered."
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 5:51 PM
"Well, that's all! I'll let you know if I need your help with Sam."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 5:52 PM

Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 5:55 PM
"Oh. Right. Forget about it. All you need to know is he's really evil. Left a girl he could've saved to almost die, and just ran away. She's in a coma right now."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 5:56 PM
"Well, thanks for the tip, but like, there are a million people on Earth named Sam."
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 6:00 PM
"Kidink so? Anyway, I'm gonna go now. Don't disappoint me. Disappointing someone as powerful as me is basically worse than disappointing yourself."
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 6:06 PM
"...I guess I'll try not to, yeah." She nods noncommittally. She'll have to think about what this all means once she wakes up.
6:09 PM
"See ya."
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 6:22 PM
Ehn leaves.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 6:29 PM
Ashley breathes a sigh of relief. The dream is probably over now, so all she needs to do now is just wake up. She stands there in her room, waiting for the moment where she returns to consciousness.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 6:31 PM
She does not wake up.
6:31 PM
She continues to stand there just the same.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 6:32 PM
Huh...? She tries pinching herself. This should definitely be a dream if she doesn't feel it, right?
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 6:32 PM
Reality does not falter from a single pinch.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 6:37 PM
She starts to sweat again, and her head begins pounding. Maybe... Maybe she was just sleepwalking, and she woke up just now! Or maybe she was hallucinating all that after waking up! Yeah, a hallucination would make sense. After all, she hadn't even felt Ehn- she'd passed right through its body. What could that mean if not that it was a hallucinatory image? She crosses her arms, trying to reassure herself of that. Her eyes are drawn to the jacket Ehn presented her with. The invisibility jacket. Putting that on wouldn't really turn her invisible. She'd just put it on, and it'd be a normal jacket, and everything would be normal! She walks over to the invisibility jacket and tries to put it on.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 6:41 PM
In what way is she putting it on?
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 6:41 PM
She puts her arms through both of the sleeves, zips up the jacket, and puts on the hoodie if there is one.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 6:42 PM
The second the zipper reaches the top, she stops being able to see her limbs.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 6:45 PM
As soon as this happens, Ashley lets out another yelp and falls over to the floor again. She tries looking down at where she would ordinarily see the rest of her body, searching desperately for any trace of herself. Her breathing rapidly increases in speed and intensity- she tries to calm herself down, but she can barely focus on anything. It feels like her vision is becoming hazy.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 6:46 PM
Looking in the mirror, she is clearly invisible.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 6:49 PM
Her hands desperately claw at where she remembers the zipper of her jacket being. It's real, it's real, it's real, oh god, oh god what the fuck is going on why is this real HOW is this real! Fuck! Get it off! Get it off now!
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 6:54 PM
When the zipper goes down, Ashley can see herself again.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 7:12 PM
She lets out a big and shaky breath, trying to calm herself down as her body continues to tremble all over. Okay, so she has a fucking invisibility jacket now that a talking cat gave to her after insulting her future girlfriend. What a morning. What is she going to do with it now??? There's so much she could try, the possibilities overwhelming her almost as much as the reality of her situation. But... No, however insane her morning is, being invisible isn't going to mean she can just stop living her normal life. The best way to think about this isn't as some magical ticket to happiness that can just get her anything she wants. If she's really going to accept this as a part of her world, as fucking deranged as she must be to do that, she'll have to use it with an actual plan in mind. Her goals aren't any different now than they were before this started happening to her. She needs Autumn's approval, she needs to talk more with Alex, and... as much as she hates to admit it, there's a voice in the back of her mind telling her that checking up on Aura and Thomas again would be the easiest thing in the world if she was invisible to them. Just to confirm that Aura really is the selfish brat Autumn already said she was, though- obviously not for any other reason. And most of all, despite the abnormality of it all, if she suddenly starts to behave abnormally because of it, the people around her could pick up on it. If she's going to be responsible for this jacket, she'll have to be responsible for the rest of her priorities the same way she's always been. So she can't let herself be stirred into a panic here. She needs to have things under control. Yes. As long as she just sticks to her plan, there won't be anything to panic over. As she thinks these things, her body gradually stops shaking. Her breathing returns to normal.
7:13 PM
Ashley picks herself up from the ground yet again and checks the calendar on her wall. What day is it today?
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 7:20 PM
It's thursday.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 7:22 PM
Shit. That means school today. Ashley digs in her pocket for her phone and checks the time. How soon until the bus arrives at her stop?
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 7:26 PM
Very soon. She might have to skip breakfast if she wants to avoid asking for help again.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 7:28 PM
That she does. She immediately grabs her backpack and bolts out the door without even saying anything to her parents, still wearing the unzipped invisibility jacket.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 7:28 PM
She makes it to the bus. (edited)
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 7:29 PM
Thank goodness. She pulls out her phone while on the bus to see if there've been any new Twitter notifications. She's been inactive the last few days as a result of all the shit going on in her life, so she might've fallen behind on whatever's going on there.

Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 9:12 PM
Reading this string of messages makes Ashley's heart twist itself into a knot. She attempts to type several responses, but ends up just turning her phone off and putting it next to her on the bus seat, staring out the window as she tries to ignore the stinging sensation in her eyes.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 9:13 PM
The bus arrived at school.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 9:14 PM
Ashley keeps looking out the bus's window. Is Autumn there?
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 9:17 PM
Autumn is not there yet. But Aura is in front of the school right now.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 9:22 PM
Ashley does a double take and lets out a barely-audible gasp. It feels like electricity is shooting through her entire body, and she momentarily forgets where she is, before noticing everyone else getting off the bus. After a few moments of collecting herself, she steps off the bus at the back of the line and tries to nonchalantly make her way over to Aura.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 9:23 PM
"Good mornyang, Ashley!" Aura is cheery as ever, somehow.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 9:31 PM
Ashley doesn't know what to say. How could she...? What do you say to someone you left like that? "Why are you still talking to me"? "Sorry for leaving you to be dragged back home by your abusive brother while you were begging to stay by my side"? "Why do you still care about me"? "Why do I still care about you"...? She doesn't say anything. Instead, acting purely on instinct, Ashley moves to pull Aura into a close hug.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 9:33 PM
Aura hugs her back. "Awww, I'm happy to see you too, bestie!"
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 9:38 PM
After pulling away from the hug, Ashley manages a really, really awkward smile. "Th-Thanks, Aura," she responds, her voice cracking a little. (edited)
9:41 PM
"I'm... happy to see you too," she adds, almost shamefully muttering it.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 9:46 PM

Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 9:48 PM
"S... Sure! I'd love to do that, as long as we don't miss class, of course." (edited)
9:50 PM
You dumbass, she thought to herself. You're seeing her for the first time since you thought she was dead and you're more concerned about not skipping class? Do you ever think about anyone other than yourself? She shook her head a little to get rid of those thoughts.
Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 9:51 PM
"Alright, what do you want to play?" The more obnoxious parts of her vocabulary seem to be getting less frequent, but she still has yet to drop the eternally playful tone.
Ashley Laurier 12/10/2022 9:55 PM

Ehn/PC 12/10/2022 10:09 PM

10:14 PM

Ehn/PC 12/11/2022 1:29 PM
((Saturday))
1
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 2:10 PM
"Yup! So whadda ya wanna play?"
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 2:47 PM
"Well…" Suddenly indecisive, Ashley looks over her surroundings to see who else is within her range of vision. She does want to play with Aura, no doubt about that. It'd be incredibly nice to just let her worries fade away and indulge in this opportunity. But there's some part of her that can't trust what's going on here for whatever reason– like a nagging voice in the back of her head telling her that this is wrong, somehow. Is it the voice of her moral compass, telling her to stop giving second chances to someone so selfish? The voice of her infatuation, telling her that Autumn would never let her hear the end of it if she found out she was still ignoring her advice? The voice of her online friends, reminding her of how much simpler and less stressful everything is there, and that she should just not bother with people this complicated? …Well, figuring out what part of her brain's making her so hesitant would be a chore in itself. She continues to glance around to take note of anyone nearby.
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 2:50 PM
No one notable. "How about this? Wannya play pretend?"
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 2:52 PM
"O-Oh, sure." She snaps back to reality. "What are we pretending?"
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 2:57 PM
"Hm… Well, what’s your biggest dream in the whole wide world, bestie?"
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 3:09 PM
Ashley answered without hesitation. "Helping people, of course! More than anything else, I want to be someone who makes the world a happier and brighter place to live in for anyone and everyone I can."
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 3:14 PM
"Hurray! Then I’ll be the damsel in distress, and you can be the superhero!"
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 3:18 PM
Ashley smiles. "Sounds good to me. Though… what am I saving you from, then?"
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 3:21 PM
"I dunno… Maybe I’m trapped somewhere and nya gotta free me?"
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 3:29 PM
"Trapped by who, though?" Ashley tilts her head. "Surely a damsel in distress doesn't get herself into that situation all on her own, does she? What would a hero story be without a villain for them to fight back against and prove wrong?"
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 3:33 PM
"Don’t you think villains are kinda silly though? Even if people make mistakes, I think they all probably mean well!" Aura makes a silly expression.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 3:51 PM
Ashley sighs. "I mean, sure, you could say that. There are definitely reasons some of them have for doing what they do. But they're still villains, right? Should the hero just leave the damsel in distress alone because the villain meant well deep down? Should they make up and be friends after the villain destroyed an entire city yesterday just because he was in a bad mood? Maybe there really is more to these people than meets the eye. But so what? If they're going to keep doing this over and over and make it harder for all the good people just trying to live their lives, I think the freaks should be run out of society. They clearly don't deserve that kindness after what they did." (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 3:53 PM
"You’re getting pretty into this, but it’s just a game. Can’t we just have fun without a villnyain?"
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 4:04 PM
The question catches her off guard. After hesitating for a moment, she relents. "…Sure, sorry. We could make it like, I have to save you from a burning building or something."
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 4:07 PM
"That works!" She stands back and begins wildly flailing her arms to mimic fire. "Kyaaaaa! Oh no! The catgirl factory has burst into flames!"
4:07 PM
People look over at them judgementally.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 4:19 PM
Ashley can feel herself blushing from those around her judging her, yet firmly ignores them. She's having fun with her friend, after all. "Don't worry, I'll save you!" She pantomimes bursting through a window and rolling across the floor, ending up in front of Aura. "Are you okay?" she asks, extending her hand outward. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 4:21 PM

Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 5:08 PM

5:13 PM
"Right, I'll put out the fire with my freezing abilities!!" Ashley thrusts out her hands and makes a whooshing noise with her mouth to indicate that she's blown freezing air at the fire, thus putting it out.
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 5:16 PM
"Hurray! We’re saved!" Aura performs some amateur cheerleading. "…" Autumn arrives, and watches them with the most extreme mix of confusion and disgust.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 5:28 PM
Ashley feels her blood run cold. She turns to Autumn and gives an awkward smile. "Hhhhi, Autumn! I was wondering when you'd show up, haha! W-What's up?"
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 5:37 PM
"Why are you talking to her? Shouldn’t you be associating with better people?" Autumn.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 5:52 PM
"I…" Autumn, of course, was completely correct. Ashley had barely given it a second thought before just jumping right back into playing with Aura like they were still the best of friends. Why had she done that? Yeah, maybe it would be nicer if she could be friends with everyone, but there were just some lines you can't cross, and now she's crossed one again. All for what? Curiosity? She hadn't even managed to get anything else out of Aura about her home situation here. She could explain to Autumn that she was only trying to get information, that she wasn't trying to associate with her at all… but if she explained that in front of Aura, she'd surely damage her ability to get more of that information. Why did it have to end up like this…? She decides to brush it aside for later. If what she's planning works out, she won't have to even look like she's associating with Aura anymore. "Sorry, I'll tell you later. Right now we should be getting to class, don't you think?"
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 5:56 PM
"Yes. Of course." Autumn's immediate disgust fades, but it’s still clear from her face alone that she’s in a sour mood.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 5:59 PM
Ashley specifically avoids looking at her face while walking to class.
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 6:01 PM
Autumn and Aura both go to class as well.
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 6:14 PM
They both sit on opposite sides of Ashley.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 6:17 PM
She decides not to talk to either of them. Instead, she pulls out a paper and pencil, pretending to be absorbed in the process of drawing. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 6:21 PM
A substitute teacher comes into the class. They quickly explain that today people will be paired off into groups of 2 and will answer some team questions for group bonding. By this method, Ashley is sorted with Aura.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 6:27 PM
Ashley winces at this, but remains silent nonetheless. She's waiting for someone else to say something or ask something of her before doing anything.
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 6:30 PM
"Oh, excuse me!" Autumn gets up. "Ashley and Aura are already way too close… That’s why they sat together. Don’t you think this exercise would work better if they were less acquainted? I could switch with Aura for this." "Aw, c'mon! There’s nyo such thing as enough friendship, right Ashley?" Aura.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 6:41 PM
"Well, it's true that it would work better if the partners were less familiar with each other… but Autumn, didn't you sit next to me too? And I even slept over at your house the other night," she adds, trying her hardest to seem like she's asking from a purely inquisitive standpoint. "Are you saying that after all that, you don't think you're 'too close' to me either? I do understand your concerns, but I think if we're switching me to a partner I'm not already acquainted with, it should be neither of you. That is, assuming we even can switch." Silently, Ashley prays that this gets the both of them off her back without having to make an explicit moral alignment with either. She just needs a bit more time. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 6:46 PM
"Ashley, I'm trying to help you." Autumn looks at Aura with an angered look. "And you, are you really going to try to rush back in like as is well? Ashley's not your 'bestie' anymore. Accept that. "What awe you tawking about?" Aura. "Wow, your evil is so stubborn it might put your brother to shame. How disgusting." Autumn looks around for approval. "Really, no one in this class would actually tolerate someone like Aura right? You aren't the awful kind of people who'd let someone like that into their life, right?" The class speak some general words of agreement with Autumn.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 6:56 PM
Ashley nervously laughs and shakes her head. "I'm not saying I'd rather be with her than you, okay? I agree with what you said– this would work better if I'm partnered with someone I don't know. I'm not suggesting against working with you because I'd prefer to be working with Aura, it's because the spirit of the exercise would rule both of you out. All I'm doing is following your suggestion to its logical conclusion, aren't I? Or was there another reason you suggested what you did?" She smiles. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 7:03 PM
"I suggested it because I wanted to help you, Ashley. Don’t you want to spend more time with me?" Autumn smiles maliciously.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 7:18 PM
"Of course I do. And we have all the time in the world to do that. But that's not what this is really about, is it?" Ashley is no longer smiling. "I'll work with you if that's what you want, but doesn't that go against your concerns from before? Were you really ever concerned about following the point of the exercise? It'd be a whole lot easier if you could just give me your real reason for doing this, because it isn't really helping anything…" She's still maintaining a casual tone, but there's no illusion of it being happy anymore.
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 7:29 PM
"My reason was to help you. Like I just said. Don’t take a meaningless fib that seriously. I was just trying to avoid bringing up the actual fight to the whole class." Autumn. "But nyou told me anyway, yeah?" Aura responded smugly. Autumn stares at Aura with unconcealed hatred but says nothing.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 7:54 PM
"Then think of a better lie next time!" Ashley hisses. "You know how much I want to believe in you, Autumn? You know how much I was trying to prevent this specifically from happening? As long as it was convincing enough, I'm sure I would've bought into anything you told me. But you can't just do all this for your own sake and call it 'helping' like that changes anything! When you set up a situation like this where I have to make a choice that you keep making into more and more of a big deal, is that avoiding a fight to you? If you could just accept that I don't want to talk to either of you right now, nothing would've gone wrong. This isn't some important choice for me to make between the two of you. It's a classroom assignment. Can't you actually treat it like one?" Her voice is equally frustrated and pleading. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 7:58 PM
The classroom openly judges Ashley for this outburst. "You don’t want to talk to me? Me? What happened to wanting to be my- My-" She’s unable to get the words out around her audience, and instead just sits down promptly. Aura pretends to hear nothing.
Ashley Laurier 12/17/2022 8:10 PM
"Not wanting to talk to you doesn't mean I don't...!" Ashley trails off. Does it? Do people who are really in love with each other usually have these kinds of arguments? It was just about pairing up for a classroom assignment, it wasn't supposed to be a big deal or anything... Am I just making an ass of myself over nothing again? Ugh, fuck! I fucked up again, didn't I?! She feels tears forming in the corners of her eyes again, almost as if it's routine these days. If I was already disappointing her before, there's no chance she'll forgive me for this. She was trying to help me, and I just can't be a nice enough person to accept the offer. I've always gotta find some way to fuck things over for myself, no matter how much I try to--! She buries her face in her hands as she puts her head down on her desk, now unresponsive to the room around her.
Ehn/PC 12/17/2022 8:13 PM
The teacher gets annoyed over the fight and just puts all 3 together. ((End session))

She tries to take a deep breath. What a miserable situation. If she could, she'd use her jacket to turn invisible and run out of this classroom. Even without it, she could just hide under her desk. But… of course, hiding is just another stupid way for her to try to escape her own problems. As much as she'd begged that cat for it, there's nothing she can do to turn back time. If she wants to find some way to mitigate things, she needs to start assessing the situation as it is right now. Ashley glances down at the cards on her desk, trying to read what's written on them.

The first question is: 'What's the best piece of advice you've ever been given?'

After a minute of gathering herself in silence, she mumbles "What's the best piece of advice you've ever been given." through her fingers to no one in particular. Have you ever thought about how I feel every time you ask me to play with you, knowing that there's something horribly wrong with your life that I guess I just don't have the privilege of knowing because- because you don't trust me enough, or you don't care about me enough, or- or- Have you EVER thought for a second about how that feels?!"
Ehn/PC 1/21/2023 3:18 PM

Autumn slowly advanced towards Ashley as she spoke. "You feel unhappy, miserable, so you've projected aaaallll of that onto your cruel and heartless 'friend', and then... You made yourself the victim of it all because reality dared to disagree with your fantasies. If you wanted to be a good person, you wouldn't let your feelings cloud your better judgment. You'd think rationally. In fact, misery and pain aren't feelings a good person feels at all. I can attest to that." She stared up at the sky, as if fantasizing about something unreachable beyond the horizon. "Goodness... Is like soaring through the skies as the guardian angel of the world... Where wax wings melted long ago, and only the true fly high." She looked back at Ashley, and placed a hand on her shoulder. "It's not so simple to make us crash."

It'd be convenient for her search if that happened, but… well, it would certainly upset her parents, and she absolutely doesn't want to draw attention to herself or her intentions here. If there's some way she could achieve her goal without raising suspicion, that'd obviously be the option she'd take… But there's nothing to be done dreaming of perfect outcomes. Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 4:03 PM
(( @Ashley Laurier hi it’s been nearly an hour))
Ashley Laurier 2/25/2023 4:28 PM
Ashley smiles. "Don't worry about it, Thomas. I'm sorry too." What a dumbass! How does someone his age not know to fake an apology? "Hey, how about we hang out a bit tonight to make it up to each other? I wanted to ask you about some stuff..." She silently prays that his parents will be on board with the idea.
Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 4:29 PM
He is so deeply terrified. "Doesn’t that sound great?" Aura's mother nods her head.

Obviously my priority right now is to ask him about Sam, but if I can get the other thing out of him, it'd kill two birds with one stone. I wonder when dinner will be…? Maybe I could ask to set the table.
Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 4:39 PM

Ashley Laurier 2/25/2023 4:45 PM

Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 4:47 PM

Ashley Laurier 2/25/2023 4:51 PM
Ashley's smile wavers slightly. She doesn't say anything to Aura, but starts wondering how long it would take to strangle someone to death. Was it three minutes or seven minutes? She could've sworn it was one of the two, but she couldn't remember. "So are we going to your room?"
Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 4:53 PM
He enters his room.

Ashley Laurier 2/25/2023 5:11 PM
Yeah, pretty expected start. But that last bit's interesting… why would he think I'd do that? Does he know something I don't? "What if I did?" She raises her eyebrows at him as passive-aggressively as ever.
Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 5:13 PM

Ashley Laurier 2/25/2023 6:01 PM

Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 6:02 PM

Ashley Laurier 2/25/2023 6:08 PM
"Look, I'm not even here to do anything to you. It's not like I trust you any more now, but the two of us are just looking for Sam at the moment. I figured since I'd seen you around him quite a few times, you'd be the man to ask. Can you help a girl out?"
Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 6:10 PM

Maybe I've disagreed with him sometimes, but you should know from every time I talk with you that I'd never want someone to be stuck in a shitty family."
Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 6:37 PM

Ashley Laurier 2/25/2023 6:46 PM

Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 6:48 PM

Ashley Laurier 2/25/2023 7:05 PM

Maybe my solutions aren't perfect, but a good person would work with me to show me where I'm going wrong and how to improve. All you do is shrug off anyone asking you to try and beat anyone who doesn't agree. Is not giving anyone a chance really working out that well for you, dickhead?!"
Ehn/PC 2/25/2023 7:09 PM

Ashley Laurier 3/3/2023 3:37 PM
"...Uh, okay." He's saying something completely incomprehensible again. Maybe I should just ignore him? Every time he's tried to push me into doing something, it's always ended up getting me or someone else hurt. But... this feels like the first time he's given me real advice instead of dismissive bullshit. What's his idea here?
Ehn/PC 3/3/2023 3:39 PM

Ashley Laurier 3/3/2023 4:22 PM
Thomas's advice still ringing in her mind, Ashley considers how to respond to this. "Don't react"... "no matter what"... Should I not say anything back now, then? But it's just a normal observation. Seriously, what gives...? In the end, she just gives another awkward little nod.
Ehn/PC 3/3/2023 4:24 PM

Ehn/PC 3/3/2023 4:56 PM
((I'm just going to assume Ashley does too)) "Thank you so much for inviting us." Raymond. "Well, when we heard your daughter was fighting with our son, we just had to do something to help. Ashley Laurier 3/3/2023 5:08 PM
Ashley doesn't say anything. How did they even find that out in the first place? I can't imagine Thomas would have told them. And Aura... No, she's not the type to tell anyone her problems at all, no matter who it is. Was it Autumn, then? And... Wait, if caring for a child is so important to them, shouldn't they have noticed how Aura's being treated by now? This should be the perfect chance to let them know what's really going on with their daughter, but... Her face twists in frustration, which she tries to pass off as part of the same discomfort the others at the table are feeling.
Ehn/PC 3/3/2023 5:10 PM

Ehn/PC 3/3/2023 6:14 PM

Ashley Laurier 3/3/2023 6:34 PM
Ashley starts fidgeting in her seat a little. Is she really such a sore subject for everyone in this family? Maybe that's why nothing's been done about the way Thomas treats her. They're just happy that he's doing well, so they don't even care about how poorly their other kid's doing because of him. Still, that just means I'm stuck with no allies in getting rid of him, and that's not exactly new. It's the way things have always been.
Ehn/PC 3/3/2023 6:37 PM

Ashley Laurier 3/3/2023 7:14 PM
Shit. "Hi, Aura." Ashley tries to choose the wording of her response carefully, enough to hopefully satisfy her parents without setting any of the Nielsens off. "The... dinner's great, right?"
Ehn/PC 3/3/2023 7:17 PM

Ashley Laurier 3/3/2023 8:08 PM

Ehn/PC 3/3/2023 8:15 PM

Please don't go embarrassing yourself and this family like this." Aura's mother looked at her with a disgusted expression as she continued to squeeze. "Mom... It's fine... She gets it... You don't have to hurt her." Thomas. "Hurt her? Oh, don't be so dramatic. You're such a sweetheart for worrying about her, aren't you? But she's the one who refuses to learn..." Aura's mother turned to Lilia and Raymond. "Honestly, after how much work we put into raising our son, you'd think we'd be rewarded with a great daughter, not some freak." "Children are an enigma." Raymond casually responds.
Ashley Laurier 3/3/2023 8:28 PM
Ashley feels her stomach drop. What the hell is this...? It's like she's suddenly in some bizarre alternate reality. Since when were things like this? Without thinking, she covers her hand with her mouth as she begins sweating. She can't look at Thomas right now. There's a sickening feeling she has that seeing him would cause something inside her to break. Instead, she glances at her parents. How are they just... just watching this, and...
Ehn/PC 3/3/2023 8:38 PM
"Mom, that's enough!" Thomas. "Oh, please, Thomas. I understand you're an empathetic person, but could you aim that more at me right now? If I have to keep bearing with this kind of behavior I think I'm going to simply lose my mind." Aura's mother. "She understands... She'll listen now." Thomas. "I appreciate the attempt, but it means nothing if it doesn't come from her. She needs to grow up, not rely on other people so much." Aura's mother turns to Ashley. Ashley Laurier 4/7/2023 9:01 PM
"She... doesn't," Ashley can barely get the shaky words out of her mouth. With a hand trained by deeply ingrained instincts from who knows how many hours of use, she casually slips a hand into her jacket pocket and unlocks her phone laying inside it without looking. While still talking, she swipes through her apps by muscle memory until reaching Voice Memos, which she opens and begins a new recording. I can do this. I CAN do this. This is... This is the perfect opportunity. Hearing it might be hard... maybe it'll get worse before it gets better... but this is the only way. I have to have the proof. If no one else is going to, I have to make it better myself. I have to do this. I... I have to do this...! "When we're... When we're at school together... she doesn't ask me for anything. In fact... I'm the one asking her about things most of the time. But no matter how much I ask her... no matter how much I try to get her to open up about what's going on in her life... s-she never lets me in." Her voice turns emotional. "I can tell there's something wrong with her. There's something that scares her, that she can't talk to me about. Th-There's some reason she feels like she has to hide away her feelings like this, some reason to be so closed-off all the time... some reason she never wants to go home at the end of the day..." She fixes her gaze on Mrs. Nielsen, attempting the most controlled expression and tone she can manage. "Is it because of you?" (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/7/2023 9:12 PM
Aura's mom tries to feign a laugh. "Now... Come on..." She gently pats Ashley on the shoulder, but the feeling is anything but comforting. "Who gave you the right to judge how a mother raises her child? Are you supposed to be a professional now? You're just a little kid. Even our dear Thomas over there has much more experience than you... And he's perfectly well aware that he's in no position to judge any other parent. Honestly, youngsters these days..." She turns to Ashley's parents expectantly. The Lauriers just awkwardly laugh it off. "Ashley... That's enough..." Thomas. "But if you must ask, no. No, I don't want the daughter I put my time into raising for so long... To be such an utterly unsociable mess. But I suppose it's true what they say: You can't teach an old dog new tricks. And she certainly is a bitch, isn't she?" Aura's mom puts on a polite smile, one eerily similar to the one plastered on Autumn's face so often. "What I've done is nothing short of charity."
Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 5:31 PM
Ashley looks at Thomas with a face somewhere in the midpoint of anger, terror, and despondency. There are a million other things she could say, all of which she wants to yell at Mrs. Nielsen at the top of her lungs, but she sighs and nods her head. Her job here is done, anyways. "...Alright. Um... Hey, the dinner's great, but could I be pointed to the bathroom?"
Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 6:00 PM
"Yes, it's that way..." Aura's mom vaguely gestures to a door, before returning to her meal. "I'm so sorry for all that. Please, let's not dwell on it." "Well, it's not like we're perfect parents either. Who're we to judge?" Raymond nods awkwardly. "Either?" Aura's mom. "Mom-" Thomas. She shushes her son. "We're having a conversation. I appreciate your effort, but really... I can speak for myself."
Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 6:49 PM
Ashley gets up and heads to the door implied to lead to the bathroom. As she walks there, she tries to listen to what Mrs. Nielsen is saying in case there's anything else she should be recording.
Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 6:52 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 7:02 PM
She immediately pulls her phone out of her pocket, opening Voice Memos and ensuring the volume is turned extremely low. Putting it up to her ear, she begins playing the most recent recording, making sure she clearly recorded what was being said at the table.

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 7:13 PM

sam is safe i made sure of it also i have something important to send you in a second
Then, turning the ringer on her phone off so that it doesn't make any noise, she quietly steps out of the bathroom and (if possible) attempts to position herself outside of it such that she can't be seen from the table, but can still hear what's being said there.
Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 7:15 PM

Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 7:52 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 8:00 PM
"What's that got to do with it??" she asks with genuine confusion. "Being strong is better than being weak, but it's not gonna save you from anything. You can be strong all you want after you get out of here, and you'll be a lot happier too!"
Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 8:01 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 8:06 PM
Ashley feels as though she's been punched in the face. "What do you mean you don't want to leave??? What even is there for you here?!" She takes a breath, attempting to get her emotions under control. "Aura, if there's someone making you say this, you don't have to listen to them right now, okay? We can just talk this out, but I promise you don't have to lie to me…"
Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 8:08 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 8:16 PM

Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 8:18 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 8:21 PM

Does that mean whoever was at the table agreed to have it moved here? Taking a deep breath, Ashley zips up her jacket. Then, she walks to the back wall of the bathroom and runs directly towards the door, jumping into it at the end of her run and throwing her full body weight against it.

Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 9:32 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 9:41 PM
The voice shoots through Ashley's body like lightning coursing through her veins. As soon as she hears it, she wipes the tears out of her eyes with the sleeve of her jacket and scrambles to her feet, as the pain in her head explodes in protest. With all the focus she can sustain, she stares at the doorknob like her own life depends on it, one hand on the zipper of her jacket. When I get out, she's going to blame Aura for this. There's absolutely no way she won't. I can't let that happen. I won't let her get hurt again.
Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 9:41 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 10:10 PM
Ashley crawls back inside the bathroom into a blind spot behind the opened door and unzips her jacket, acting as though she's just come out from behind it. She's not crying anymore, but she does groan in a lot of pain and there are probably tear streaks still visible on her face. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 10:16 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 11:03 PM

Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 11:07 PM

I dunno what you mean, mo-" Aura was slapped hard in the face by her mother and toppled over.
Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 11:51 PM
As her last weapon of retaliation, Ashley pulls out her phone and begins a video recording of the two of them. "Mrs. Nielsen, please just stop." She isn't even able to yell it, and her voice sounds more resigned than anything, but she stays away from Aura's mother with enough distance that she'd have a head start running from her if necessary. "I know she can apologize without someone hitting her. I've seen her do it. And I don't think any of us want a video of that happening again, right?"
Ehn/PC 4/8/2023 11:52 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/8/2023 11:57 PM

11:59 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 12:20 AM
She gives her mother a small judgmental stare that rests exactly on the border of anger and sadness, but otherwise doesn't say anything.

Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 12:30 AM

Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 12:38 AM
Well, even if he doesn't know what to say, that's fine. She's seen enough already. Now that she knows for sure what's going on, there's no way Autumn won't believe her! She reminds herself that as she turns back and continues walking out of the house. Autumn has to understand now. She'll make everything alright again. She can save all of them.
Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 12:40 AM
Lilia and Raymond are outside, looking at her with disappointed gazes. They don’t say anything.
Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 12:41 AM

Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 12:41 AM
"Ashley, what the hell was that?" Lilia. (edited)
Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 12:42 AM
"I dunno. What do you think it was?" She says this almost spitefully.
Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 12:51 AM
"Ashley… Do you think you know everything? That you can raise a child better than her real mother? We’ve been very kind to you and given you many freedoms other kids your age only dream of… But it’s clear that’s gone to your head. You have to be responsible for your own actions before you can be responsible for another human being. And after how you used that responsibility with your friends back in Avengard-" Lilia gets cut off by Raymond. "Ashley… We love you dearly, but…What your mother is trying to say, is that we’re worried you might be letting your immaturity cloud your judgment. It’s okay, we understand… Every kid your age thinks they have all the answers and they can play god. But if you stick down that kind of path, you’re gonna end up either in prison or the Catholic Church. And… It’s our duty as parents to at least prevent that. Right, honey?" Raymond. "Right." Lilia.
Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 1:12 AM
At the mention of her old friend group, Ashley involuntarily grabs her arm with her hand and digs her nails into her skin, hard enough to cause the first sensation of pain that distracts her from that of her head. Apart from that though, she doesn't have any particularly extreme response to her parents' words, simply softening her expression and listening. "……Yeah. I'm sorry, mom, dad. I know you guys are just trying your best." She gives a sad smile. "I get that I don't have all the answers, for sure, it's just… sometimes it's hard to feel like there's anyone out there who does. … …Maybe I…" She's about to say 'Maybe I should find someone I can talk to about this', but something stops her. Doesn't she have people to talk to already? She was just thinking about talking to Autumn about all this; is she really so mistrustful that she can't even talk to her crush about what's going on? Maybe Autumn was right about her needing to be more open about things. And who else would she want anyways? Some therapist, when she's not even depressed, just to take away that opportunity from someone who needs it much more than she does? No. "…Maybe I'll understand when I'm older," she finishes. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 8:25 AM

Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 12:39 PM

Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 12:41 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 1:32 PM

Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 1:35 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 1:36 PM
"…" Though she tries to fight it for her parents' sake, Ashley can feel her paranoia flare up from within her again. As she enters the house behind them, she places her hand on the zipper of her jacket again almost without thinking about it. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 1:37 PM
The inside looks normal. Raymond and Lilia go off into the living room.
Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 1:39 PM

Yeah, that'd be stupid… She pulls out her phone to check her Twitter account more thoroughly this time, although she still walks around the house checking its other rooms just to be sure they're all in order. She paces around the house a lot when nobody's home anyways.
Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 1:41 PM
Every room looks completely normal, up until Ashley reaches her room. In her room, everything looks normal as well, except for her computer, which has been left on her twitter account. Ashley can feel pretty confident that’s not how she left it.
Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 1:44 PM
She feels like the wind's been knocked out of her. As quickly as she can, she walks over to her computer and sits down to look at it, both reading the Twitter page and opening a new tab to see her computer's browser history. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 1:45 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 1:46 PM

Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 1:47 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 1:47 PM

Ashley closes the DM page and starts scrolling through her list of followers, looking at their names, usernames, icons, and bios. Do they look like bots?
Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 2:01 PM

Ashley Laurier 4/9/2023 2:06 PM

Ehn/PC 4/9/2023 2:07 PM
