Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 9:44 PM
A part of them are easily recognizable as bots but there’s definitely a baffling amount of real people following you.
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 10:25 PM
She shudders and gulps instinctively. How would something like this even happen? And who would care about breaking into her house just to raise her follower count? She's sure that nobody she knows IRL even knows her Twitter exists, so it doesn't seem likely that any of them came over to do this. But even then, shouldn't a total stranger have even less of a motive to break in just to give her more of a Twitter following? What kind of goal would someone doing that even have? …Maybe it's about publicity in general. Whoever this is, they want everyone to have as many eyes on her as possible. That's the only reason she can think of for why something like this would happen. Though… it's not like she'd be giving anything away about herself, right? She's already tried as hard as possible not to give anything away about her personal life through her Twitter activity. That's not what she's ever used the account for; it's just been video game discourse and spreading awareness of important causes. Is it related to that… thing that was on her bed the other day? Honestly, she's not even sure 'Ehn' was someone she actually met. It's possible she was just hallucinating waking up— some kind of sleepwalking that ended with her fully regaining consciousness standing in the middle of her room. Even then, though, her jacket does seem to make her invisible now, and that's held true even outside of her meeting with Ehn… …hm… Well, even if she's convinced herself that's what's happening, there's still a chance it's not true. She's never really tried out her newfound invisibility anywhere someone would actually be able to see her, at least not for any timeframe long enough to confirm that they couldn't. It's still technically possible that the Nielsens saw her fall out of their bathroom fully visible, then crawl out from behind the door again for no reason, and just didn't question it. That's… it's a stretch, but even now, it still seems more believable than being able to turn invisible. Something like that just doesn't happen in real life. Surely anybody other than her would have heard about it first, or it'd be on the news, or something. No matter how surreal it seems, maybe the stress has just been getting to her over the last few days. It wouldn't be impossible for her to start subconsciously wishing for some way to live out the fantasy of having superpowers, even if it does seem ridiculous. But if this was all real, then… no, well, it can't be real, there's just no way anything like that could happen… but… if it really did happen, her account suddenly getting all of this attention would fit with being granted the power to 'enact her idea of good onto the world', wouldn't it…? Ashley shakes her head at the thought. No. Someone like her could never have this happen to them. She heads to her Twitter homepage, looking through it in search of any important-looking petitions or informational Carrds about relevant world issues, with the intent of retweeting the first one she sees with an already tiny number of likes and retweets.
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 10:26 PM
She quickly finds one.
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 10:28 PM
Immediately, she retweets it, staring intently at both the icon for her notifications and the current amount of likes/retweets on the post in an attempt to gauge the result. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 10:29 PM
It very quickly starts to shoot up.
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 10:39 PM
Ashley starts sweating. It's… it's a good thing that she has this now, isn't it? There's no downside she can think of, and all it'll do is make her that much more able to help people, to spread awareness of messages that need to be heard… So why does it keep feeling wrong? Why can't she feel good about this unless she knows what's behind it? For the time being, Ashley closes her computer. She gets up and paces around her room for a few minutes. Is it late enough that her parents have already gone to bed? Can she hear them at all outside of her room? (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 10:40 PM
Raymond enters the room and looks at her awkwardly. "Hey… Ashley."
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 10:42 PM
She freezes up immediately. "Wh-?! Uh, hi, dad!" She tries for a smile to deflect from the slight nervousness apparent in her voice.
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 10:47 PM
"Listen, uh… I know how you feel. You know at your age, I was the same… I fought hard for my convictions. Haha…" He looks away uncomfortably. "But when you become an adult you’ve gotta be in the real world. And y’know… In the real world, adults don’t have room for these kinds of convictions. When you mature, everyone just fights for what they personally want. You won’t be any different." He taps his foot awkwardly. "So… Advice from your dad… You should drop… All of this… Before you embarrass yourself. In this social media age, you can’t escape it."
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 11:16 PM
"….." For a few seconds, Ashley doesn't do anything except stare at her father. Her gaze lacks the judgmental tinge it usually takes on in an argument against someone she disagrees with, or the sadness of being betrayed by someone she cares about. In fact, it's hard to feel like this is 'someone she cares about' in the first place. The words coming out of his mouth may as well have been in another language for how much their meaning resonates with her. Right now, although it's supposed to be her father, the man in front of her only registers as another adult willing to sit back and watch the whole world go to waste. Is this what happens to everyone growing up? She almost pities him. This man is not her father. As suddenly as they left, her emotions come rushing back in. She jerks her body into a more attentive posture as her still-aching head is filled with shame and uneasiness. "….I'll keep that in mind, yeah. Thanks for the advice." (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 11:17 PM
"Yeah… Yeah. Goodnight." He pats her on the shoulder and hurries out of the room.
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 11:21 PM
Ashley opens the door a few minutes after him, peering out of her room. Are he and mom in bed now?
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 11:21 PM
They’re going to bed, yes.
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 11:33 PM
For the second time in recent memory, she leaves her room to write a message on a sticky note in the kitchen, identical to what she'd written before:
I'm just out for a short walk before bed. Call me if you need me! -Ashley
She then exits the house, shutting the door as quietly as she can once again. This time, instead of aiming for one location in particular, she intends to cover every still-open location in town to ask people about the whereabouts of Sam Kidink.
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 11:33 PM
No one has anything to tell her. This effort proves fruitless.
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 11:42 PM
Uggghhhhhh. At the very least she's combed through enough locations that she's narrowed things down a lot in regards to where not to look for Sam, but all of this energy expended with no reward is beginning to feel frustrating. Maybe she should start thinking of ways to get it out of Thomas somehow? If he's the only one that knows, maybe her time would be better spent trying to get around him not wanting to tell her. Regardless, as she walks back home, she sends a new message to Autumn to inform her of her progress. 'ok i looked around. nobody at'— Ashley lists the places she visited around town— 'knows where sam is or at least they had nothing to tell me about him. so far it seems like thomas is the only person who's going to be able to tell us anything, you think we should try to find a way to trick him into telling us somehow?'
11:43 PM
She remembers something. 'also can we talk in person tmrw i have to tell you something'
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 11:43 PM
Autumn doesn’t respond.
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 11:45 PM
Damn it. Well, is tomorrow a school day...? Maybe she could talk to her then... Ashley tries to remember whether tomorrow is a school day as she walks back inside her house. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 11:47 PM
Tomorrow is indeed a school day, Friday. Ashley arrives back home. (edited)
Ashley Laurier 4/14/2023 11:55 PM
Upon making it home, she switches to messaging Aura while removing the sticky note in the kitchen and throwing it in the trash. 'hey' 'are you ok? i'm sorry for what happened tonight'
Ehn/PC 4/14/2023 11:57 PM
Aura’s icon briefly pops up to type, before vanishing again. She doesn’t reply.
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 12:11 AM
'if you want someone to just talk to about anything i'm here for you. i know i mess up sometimes but i don't want to seem like i'm not listening to you when you need it. even if it's just something as small as talking about whatever you feel like if that helps you i want you to know i'll go with anything you need'
12:13 AM
She waits in the kitchen for a few minutes to see if there's any response to this.
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 12:13 AM
There isn’t. The app makes it clear she didn’t even read it.
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 12:16 AM
Ashley sighs and heads to her room. In an attempt to get her mind off the events of the day, she gets in bed and instinctively opens Twitter on her phone, before wincing as it comes to mind that even that's not the same for her anymore now. Even so, she scrolls through her homepage for anything that might distract her.
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 12:20 AM
There are a few normal forgettable posts before Ashley reaches this image that’s been retweeted from a comedy account.
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 12:52 AM
A frown forms on her face immediately as she hesitates in her scrolling to look at the tweet. …What a stupid joke. She scrolls away and continues looking through the other tweets on her TL. Or, she tries to, but she finds the image resurfacing in her mind as she keeps going, having a bizarrely irritating effect on her. I mean, she's not really attracted to that random woman from a meme tweet. That'd be dumb. She's in love with Autumn and Autumn alone, not just any pretty girl she happens to come across. Okay, it's not like finding a girl other than Autumn attractive would necessarily mean she's more into them than her real life future girlfriend, but still. She's better than that. She's definitely better than some cishet man who'd just make a pass at any woman they see. No matter what, she'd never be that pathetic and gross, right? Like, yeah, maybe she's a little desperate, and maybe she thinks a lot of girls are pretty, but that doesn't make her weird, surely. Not weird enough to start believing in God as the answer to this, anyways. All that being a Christian about it could do would just be making her shame herself for being who she is, and trying to convince her that it's a sin to be a lesbian. That wouldn't fix how gross she feels about it at all. Fuck, this isn't working. Ashley turns off her phone and sets it down next to her on her bed. She squeezes her eyes shut. She blocks out all of her sight and hearing and thoughts of the world around her, denying their attempts at invading her mind. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 8:34 AM
Ashley falls asleep. ((The chapter ends.)) She wakes up to Ehn standing over her. "Rise and shine!"
Advehnt Guard
ehn-pc
Ehn/PC 9/9/2022 12:08 PM
5: Auspicious Guardian
Advehnt Guard
Other Town / ashley-laurier
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 8:34 AM
Ashley falls asleep. ((The chapter ends.)) She wakes up to Ehn standing over her. "Rise and shine!"
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 3:11 PM
As soon as the cat-thing enters her field of vision, she covers her face with her hands and closes her eyes as if it hurt to open them. "No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no…" She continues mumbling this to herself in an attempt to get it to go away.
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 3:17 PM
"Hey! That's not how you treat your generous benefactor! I'm here to help you again!" (edited)
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 3:21 PM
It's okay!! It's okay, it's not real! There's nothing that proves it's real yet! Am I going insane??? "…What is it."
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 3:23 PM
"Sam Kidink! Did you forget what I told you yesterday?"
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 3:34 PM
"Wh-…? What about Sam?"
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 3:37 PM
"I told you yesterday, didn't I? He's really evil! Left a girl to die!" Ehn did say that about a Sam and the absurd non-sequitur word of 'Kidink' was mentioned as well. Ashley can remember this.
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 3:55 PM
"Okay, even if that were true, what good does it do me to know that? I've already been trying to find him for a whole day now, and it's not like I can do anything about how good or evil he is if I don't know where he is in the first place. If you're really here to help me, wouldn't you be telling me how to get to him?" Maybe it's better I think of this as part of my own mind. I guess it wouldn't be that weird for there to be some part of me that thinks he's evil. Which probably makes what it's saying about leaving a girl to die just some imaginary crime I'm making up to try to convince myself. If I'm aware of my own thoughts like this, I can keep myself from acting on those impulses, at least.
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 3:58 PM
"Well, because he escaped his mother yesterday, she thinks he's not here. Sooooo... I need you to call her back and let her know her son is safe and alive right here in this town."
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 4:01 PM
"Why should I do that? If he really is as terrible as you say, I want to be the one to get my hands on him, not fork him over to his mom. She probably doesn't even know how to deal with him."
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 4:03 PM
"Because that's the way the story goes! Besides, what proof are you gonna confront him with? A magic ghost animal told you he's guilty? He still thinks I was a delusion."
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 4:15 PM
…Huh. If this thing really isn't a delusion, then, would Sam believe me if I told him about it? I'd probably seem insane, but if we've both seen the same thing, it'd be hard to call that a coincidence. "Adults don't care about what's good or evil to begin with. All that matters to them is protecting their own interests. If his mom catches up to him, there's no way she'd care enough to give him what he deserves, not to mention she'll definitely be biased by her relation to him. And that's assuming she even has the proof herself."
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 4:19 PM
"Don't assume every mom's like yours! Naomi's waaaay more obsessed with raising her kid. It's like all she ever talks about."
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 4:34 PM
"How would I know that? How can I take you saying it for a fact, for that matter? Look, if you can tell me where to find Sam and I find out what you're saying is true, I can do what you're asking. I'm not the type of girl to just take anyone's orders on demand."
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 4:38 PM
"Oh, Autumn already texted you where he is. But it's not like you need that. You just need to call Naomi and tell her her son is here!"
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 4:49 PM
"She what??" Ashley pulls her hands away from her face and opens her eyes immediately, grabbing at the spot she remembers putting her phone down.
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 4:50 PM
Ashley has a text from both Aura and Autumn.
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 4:51 PM
She reads Autumn's text first.
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 4:52 PM
'Sam came back here.' It's from a little after you fell asleep.
Ashley Laurier 4/15/2023 5:04 PM
Upon reading this, she instantly gets up from her bed to start her normal morning routine, checking Aura's message to her as she does so. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/15/2023 5:06 PM
'nyall good :3' is all Aura said.
Ashley Laurier 4/20/2023 3:26 AM
Ashley lets out a small sigh. To be fair to herself, it's not as if she needed Aura to give her more of a response than that anymore— while that text was supposed to have the secondary effect of cheering her friend up, the primary goal was to see if she could get Aura on her side enough to cooperate in getting information about Sam from Thomas. Now that Autumn's made sure he's safe, though, there's no longer a pressing need to make her friend listen to reason. At least, not for the time being. Even then, it'd be nice if I could figure out a solution to that eventually. Obviously not everyone can admit they need others' help, but if she could just—…… Ugghhh… Ashley puts her palm to her forehead, the mental and physical pain within it now indistinguishable. Don't think about it don't think about it don't think about it don't think about it! Stop fucking thinking about it. STOP it! You did the best you could, and once you tell Autumn about what happened, she'll realize you were right and you can work to solve the problem together! And on top of that, she's already dealt with the Sam issue for you. All of your problems are on their way to being solved and you're still sitting in your room whining about them?! Go the fuck to school!! Spurred by her own mental pep talk, she briefly opens her messages with Autumn again to send her one last text for the morning: 'congrats on finding him! sorry i couldnt help but i'm glad he turned up in the end! can't wait to see you at school today :)'. She then turns back to Ehn. "Thanks for letting me know Autumn found him. Hey, I've got school, so I have to get going for that, but I'll let you know what happened with Sam the next time I see you… whenever that is. I mean, is this going to be a regular contact type of thing, or…?" As she says this, she starts to head for the door, barely even waiting for an answer. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/20/2023 7:20 AM
"Ughhh… Fine! If you’re gonna force my hand like this- Ashley Laurier! I’ve come to call in that favour! Call Naomi Kidink anonymously, tell her her son is here, and then never tell anyone else you did this!" Ashley is incapable of not immediately completing this favour. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/22/2023 2:03 PM
Ashley is incapable of not immediately completing this favour.
Ashley Laurier 4/24/2023 9:58 PM
On cue, she pulls Naomi's business card out of her jacket pocket and dials the number from it into her phone, starting up a call.
Ehn/PC 4/24/2023 10:02 PM
"Hello, you’ve reached Kidink Law Offices. How may we help you?" It’s Naomi. She sounds tired.
Ashley Laurier 4/24/2023 10:09 PM
"Hi! I'm calling about your son, Sam. You said you were looking for him, so I wanted to let you know he's in Other Town right now."
Ehn/PC 4/24/2023 10:10 PM
There’s a pause, followed by a few weak and yet hopeful words. "Sam… Is alive?"
Ashley Laurier 4/24/2023 10:14 PM
"Yup. Well, I guess I don't know for a fact that he is, but I definitely saw him in person a few days ago, and I've heard he was still safe and sound here as recently as last night."
Ehn/PC 4/24/2023 10:16 PM
You hear her slowly start to cry on the other side. "Ah… A mother always knows."
Ashley Laurier 4/24/2023 11:09 PM
At the technical fulfillment of everything in Ehn's request, Ashley frantically hangs up before dropping the phone like it's on fire. It takes the impact of her back suddenly against the wall for her to return to her reality, the pounding of her heart, the spinning of her vision, the tears in her eyes, the acceleration of her breathing, the churning in her stomach, the opening of her mouth to do something that could have either been screaming or vomiting, cut short by her biting into her hand to keep anything from escaping her lips. The taste of her own blood. The pain in her hand. The pain in her hand. She feels so dizzy that she can barely put out the other hand in front of her before she collapses to the floor, looking up through her distorted eyesight at where she saw the thing on her bed.
Ehn/PC 4/24/2023 11:35 PM
Ehn smiles. "Thank you. Was that so hard?"
Ashley Laurier 4/27/2023 3:20 PM
"…What… What are you going to do to me…? What do you want with me?" Her voice barely comes out as a whimper. At this point, she's not entirely sure whether it'd be worse for this to be a real creature trying to control her, or for it to be a figment of her imagination after all. Both possibilities have nauseating implications, and th- Wait. No. If this thing really is real… Sam should know about it. If she wants to believe there's a way out of this, she needs to find him. Otherwise… She doesn't even want to think about it. Shakily, she tries to wipe herself off, pull herself together, and get up. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/27/2023 3:21 PM
"I told you! In exchange for your power, you’d owe me a favour. That was the favour. I’m aaaaall out of tricks. Kind of a waste, really."
Ashley Laurier 4/27/2023 3:31 PM
"…" Ashley eyes the creature hesitantly. There's no way it's telling the truth. With that kind of power, why would it stop at trying to control her only one time if she ever stepped out of line in the future? There's no way she can trust this thing. "…Yeah, alright. Does this mean we won't see each other again, then? C-Could I get a picture with you for the road?" She's making a strained attempt to sound casual.
Ehn/PC 4/27/2023 3:33 PM
"Don’t be scared! Can’t you see that I’m on your side? Everyone else here is either just using you or wishes you were dead. I’m the exception, your one and only real friend."
Ehn/PC 4/27/2023 3:53 PM
"Y’know, they call dogs man's best friend for a reason. People scheme and betray you all the time, but pets never do. They’re loyal to a fault, even when you hurt and mistreat them day after day. That’s how I am too!"
Ashley Laurier 4/29/2023 7:12 PM
Ashley simply holds up her phone and tries to take a picture of Ehn, in spite of how badly her hands are shaking. (edited)
Ehn/PC 4/29/2023 7:13 PM
Ehn does not show up in the picture. "Come on, if I showed up in a picture like that I'd be a worldwide celebrity!"
Ashley Laurier 5/6/2023 9:42 PM
"Just… get out of my fucking house already!" she barely manages to spit out in a restrained tone of voice. "If you don't have any more favors for me, leave me alone!" Without even waiting for a response, she turns around and starts to run out of her room into the kitchen.
Ehn/PC 5/6/2023 9:47 PM
Ehn followed. Ashley’s parents are awake, but are clearly avoiding reacting to her. "I told you! I’m not your enemy! And even if you don’t owe me any favours, that doesn’t mean I can’t do anything for you! I’m basically like a god. A very generous one, for some people." Ehn seems more amused than anything.
Ashley Laurier 5/6/2023 10:51 PM
In spite of how badly she wants to scream something back at Ehn, Ashley keeps her mouth shut. The only thing worse than having this freak following her around would be making her parents think she's insane for talking to someone who doesn't exist. Instead, she heads straight out the door and starts running to the bus stop.
Ehn/PC 5/6/2023 10:54 PM
Ehn is still following. "I could still make other people do favours. In exchange for an ability, I could make them do anything I want. The Nielsens could respect Aura! Your parents could get over the fact you’re a- Oh, whoops. Spoilers. But they could actually care about you! Maybe I could even make Autumn love you back…?" She giggles.
Ashley Laurier 5/6/2023 11:04 PM
Is anyone around to overhear?
Ehn/PC 5/6/2023 11:04 PM
No one.
Ashley Laurier 5/6/2023 11:33 PM
Ashley sucks in her breath sharply at Ehn's last suggestion, but after a moment's hesitation, she sighs and shakes her head in frustration. "Do you actually think I'm that stupid? Like, genuinely. Aura's family is a pig piece of shit and a pair of useless morons who don't have the balls to stand up to her. The only people my parents would ever do anything for are themselves. And you're telling me— you honestly think I'd rather see them walking around with superpowers just so I could get something out of it? You think I'd rather make the whole world a worse place just to be happy? Fuck you, and fuck off trying to convince me you'd ever understand me." (edited)
Ehn/PC 5/6/2023 11:35 PM
She smiled. "I didn’t hear a no to the Autumn offer."
Ashley Laurier 5/6/2023 11:45 PM
Ashley grits her teeth and silently prays that this thing doesn't have the power to read her mind right now. "Like I'd- I'd never want to- Autumn is- You didn't even think she deserved it in the first place! The first time we met, you told me I was wrong for trusting her!"
Ehn/PC 5/6/2023 11:47 PM
"Of course you are! But I’m getting ahead of myself. I’ve got a lot of work to do!" Ehn starts walking away. "I’ll see you again after you screw everything up!" She runs off.
Ashley Laurier 5/7/2023 12:07 AM
Ashley is still running to the bus stop.
Ehn/PC 5/7/2023 12:07 AM
Ashley arrives at the bus stop. The bus isn’t here.
Ashley Laurier 5/7/2023 12:08 AM
Right, she's probably early. She checks her phone to see how much longer she has to wait for its usual arrival time.
Ehn/PC 5/7/2023 12:09 AM
Not too long. Thomas suddenly approaches her. "We have to talk. In private."
Ashley Laurier 5/7/2023 12:21 AM
She jumps at the sound of his voice. "What?"
Ehn/PC 5/7/2023 12:24 AM
"You… Acted better than I expected last night. So I owe you the truth, at least. Even if no one else is willing to give it to you." He grabbed her arm forcefully.
Ashley Laurier 5/7/2023 12:35 AM
"Wh- Wait! How long is this going to take? I can't just miss the bus!"
Ehn/PC 5/7/2023 12:36 AM
"It’ll be fine." He dragged her away.
Ashley Laurier 5/7/2023 1:04 AM
"Hey! Do you always drag people off like this?? Seriously, I really can't afford to miss school today...!" She doesn't exactly resist being pulled along by him, but she doesn't stop complaining about it either.
Ehn/PC 5/7/2023 9:03 AM
"It’s a habit." He leads her to the Nielsen’s house. "They all already left. It’ll be quiet."
Ashley Laurier 5/7/2023 3:15 PM
Well… I guess if push comes to shove, I could always run to school. I'll get there late, but one day of missing classes never hurt anyone, probably. How am I going to keep Sam safe from his mom, though? I need to tell him that she's looking for him, somehow… I could probably text Autumn something convincing… She hesitantly follows Thomas's lead while trying to think of ways to handle the Sam situation. (edited)
Ehn/PC 5/7/2023 3:20 PM
He enters and shuts the door behind her. He sighs deeply and turns to her. "So... Where to start?"
Ashley Laurier 5/7/2023 3:32 PM
Ashley manages to hold back the urge to snap something along the lines of 'You pulled me in here and probably made me miss the bus and you don't even know what you want to say??' at him, instead staying quiet and waiting for him to start.
Ehn/PC 5/7/2023 3:41 PM
"Like you heard last night, Aurora was... Adopted. For a while growing up, I didn't have a sister. And since my parents were out of town in Avengard a lot, I had to raise myself in a lot of ways. I didn't do it the best, but... Back then, I thought I was some kind of hero. Like you and that bitch Autumn, I thought I was better than everyone else, and only I could help them. I was a stupid kid, is the point... Even when Aurora came, I ignored her to do what I thought was more important. Even when things got worse, it was... Difficult for me to notice. I was too busy flying off the handle at people that didn't deserve it. When I see you..." He hits himself in the head. "Well, there's nothing I hate more now than people who think they know how to fix everything." (edited)
Ashley Laurier 5/12/2023 12:35 PM
She laughs uneasily. "I'm touched by the advice, but if you're telling me this to try to convince me to stop helping people in need, that's not gonna work. I'd try and fail to help someone a hundred times if it meant I could help them the one-hundred-and-first time. That part of me is never going to change." For a few seconds, she tries to find the right words. "But… I am… sorry to hear that happened to you. I understand why you feel the way you do now."
Ehn/PC 5/12/2023 12:40 PM
"I didn’t tell you this because I wanted your sympathy. It’s a warning. If you want to do better, stop fighting. Our parents are cops, they’re never going to receive any kind of consequence for acting how they see fit. It doesn’t matter how well you prove that they hit her, you’ll just annoy them more… And who do you think they’ll take that anger out on? Their favourite punching bag."
Ashley Laurier 5/13/2023 8:06 PM
Thomas's words conjure a sick feeling in her stomach despite her attempt at confidence. "O-Of course I know that… I'd never want to do anything that I knew would hurt Aura. But it doesn't mean I'll give up on trying to find a safe way to save her. I promise I won't do anything stupid until that happens, and I'm not going to give up hope until it does either." She glances towards the door. "…Did you have anything else? Again, I really have to be at school right now…"
Ehn/PC 5/13/2023 8:07 PM
"I do, actually. It’s about your little girlfriend. And what she’s hiding from you." The bus should be arriving soon.
Ashley Laurier 5/13/2023 8:23 PM
Oh, thank goodness. Then it's probably not anything important. If she's hiding anything from me, there's no way she doesn't have a good reason for it! I do want to defend her from whatever nasty stuff he's gonna say about her, but that can wait for later. I've got more pressing matters to attend to right now. "Okay, I'd love to talk about that later, but I don't have any more time right now. I could message you about it later if you'll give me your number." Ashley tries to suppress a cringe asking for this. (edited)
Ehn/PC 5/13/2023 8:26 PM
"You remember when Aura lied? When she said this was all her fault and she wanted attention? Autumn whispered something to me then." He ignores her response.
Ashley Laurier 5/13/2023 8:46 PM
She steps backwards towards the door. "If you have tell me now, you've gotta do it in less than three seconds." Regardless of whatever Thomas is about to say, Ashley prepares to leave the house once three seconds have passed.
Ehn/PC 5/13/2023 8:46 PM
"She told Aura to lie about that."
Ashley Laurier 5/13/2023 8:49 PM
Ashley sprints out of the house and towards the bus stop as fast as she can, as if the weight of what he's said has literally pushed her out the door.
Ehn/PC 5/13/2023 8:50 PM
Ashley arrives at the bus stop just in time to watch the bus leave without her.
Ashley Laurier 5/13/2023 9:19 PM
Her heart sinks, and she silently curses at Thomas for dragging her away just to tell her stuff she pretty much already knew. Not again… I can't go back home and ask for another ride without getting a lecture either, which'd be the last thing I need right now. I guess Autumn's place is on the way if I'm running there, though… I could maybe get driven the rest of the way by the Petersons, and I could check if Sam's home too. I've never seen him at school besides that one time at recess anyway, so… Ashley starts running to school as fast as she can.

Other Town / ashley-and-sam
Sam Kidink< 5/20/2023 4:34 PM

He gestures for her to come closer to where he is sitting, and takes out his notebook from his backpack, one of the few usable items he still has on him, to try and write something.
Ashley Laurier 5/20/2023 4:35 PM
So he does go to our school after all. Well, I don't know what I expected, but thank goodness I don't have to search around any longer. I'll tell him, and then I'll settle back into class without causing any trouble. Without missing a beat, Ashley nods and walks up to Sam. "I have to tell you something," she mumbles.
Ehn/PC 5/20/2023 4:37 PM

Ashley Laurier 5/20/2023 4:43 PM
She gives a silent thumbs up and then leans over to whisper in his ear. "Your mother's come back, and she's convinced you're somewhere in town this time. I saw her guys around today, and they're almost certainly going to find you if you don't pick a really good hiding place, fast."
Ehn/PC 5/20/2023 4:43 PM

Ashley Laurier 5/20/2023 4:54 PM

Ehn/PC 5/20/2023 4:58 PM

Ashley Laurier 5/20/2023 5:00 PM

Sam Kidink< 5/20/2023 5:01 PM

Sam Kidink< 5/20/2023 5:09 PM
I wonder what I'll do now. If they're really going to be here. Why does she care this much, right here, now of all times?! And how did they figure out? Was it Thomas' parents? ...Do I just give up eventually? I've thought that many times recently. I wonder what happened to make me start thinking this way. ...No, I have to figure out something. Giving up would be boring. If it's possible I can't go too far, I may just have to hang around inside the school. Which might be fine for now, but... I'll have to see, I guess. Instead of going out to the schoolyard, I should wait at the entrance to it.

Ashley Laurier 5/20/2023 5:25 PM

Ashley Laurier 5/20/2023 5:32 PM

Ashley Laurier 5/20/2023 5:35 PM

Sam Kidink< 5/20/2023 5:38 PM
Sam starts walking around and very seriously investigates parts of the classroom. "Hey, this desk arrangement is quite interesting. At my last school, it definitely wasn't like this. No wonder I was confused about the seating earlier." He responds to Ashley. "Sure. Though, actually, if you want to stay here and think that makes more sense, then that's fine too. I was thinking about staying here and just waiting for people to clear out. Either works."
Ashley Laurier 5/20/2023 5:44 PM
"Uh… well…" I can't stick around here if it means being around Aura. I need to be able to tell Autumn what's going on with her without getting her all riled up about it. "I think the place you mentioned before is better for me, really. Nicer there than just standing around in a boring ol' classroom."
Sam Kidink< 5/20/2023 5:46 PM
"Fair enough, though... I'll stay inside, even if we go to that general area." He leaves this time and heads to the entrance to the schoolyard, but doesn't actually go outside.

Ashley Laurier 5/20/2023 11:56 PM
Ashley can't help it. As soon as she gets out the word 'Okay' in response, she starts sobbing uncontrollably. Her crying is noiseless— she knows better than to let anyone outside hear her inside the closet. But against all of her efforts to stop the flow of tears from her eyes, or to prevent her shoulders from shaking, or to keep her sight from spiraling into nothingness, it explodes out of her without restraint. At this point, if it comes to it, just as this is the safest place if we're not found, I've locked myself in if we're found. All I have left is the mystery, I guess, if I want to explain any of that. Ashley Laurier 5/27/2023 5:52 PM
For the first time in what feels like forever, Ashley feels a wave of relief wash over her. This past week has felt like it's turned her entire life upside down… but knowing Autumn is here with her makes all of that seem so insignificant. Her life won't change, because she already has everything she could ever need. Why fight it? There's certainly no point in spending so much time doubting someone who knows just how to help her work through her problems. "Hey… Thank you."

Ehn/PC 6/2/2023 2:50 PM
"Are you trying to imply I'm some kind of cruel manipulator? Of course not. If I were to manipulate someone, it would only be for their own good. Like leading a lost puppy back home with a treat. Do you think you’re a lost puppy? If not, you should obviously understand that it’s purely mutual agreement."
Ashley Laurier 6/2/2023 3:13 PM
"N-No, I didn't mean...! It's just, I've never heard someone offer to do something like this before. It feels a little surreal, I guess..." She fidgets some more, now trying to focus all of her conscious efforts on being as normal as possible about the fact that Autumn just called her her little lost puppy. "Um… I think that if… if you're still fine with it, I'd like to try it. To have you… think for me, I mean."
Ehn/PC 6/2/2023 3:21 PM
Her expression briefly changes to bewilderment before resetting back to the usual smile. "That would be fine." Autumn's smile then suddenly cracks, replaced by pathetically pleading eyes. "But… Don’t you have a lot to do in your life? People who care about you, people who want to talk to you… It’s not like I can always be there." The tone of her voice carries a hint of confusion, like she doesn’t understand why she’s saying this.
Ashley Laurier 6/2/2023 3:52 PM
"Sure, but I'm not gonna forget how you've helped me just because you're not right there with me!" She usually doesn't act like this… Is this her self-doubting side? I guess everyone has one, even her. She's really cute like this… "Autumn, you've helped me better my life more than anyone I've ever met. I couldn't be the person I am today without knowing you, and that means even when we're not together, I'll know exactly how to live my life. Whenever I speak, I'll ask myself: 'What would Autumn say?' Whenever I think, I'll ask myself: 'What would Autumn think?' So you don't need to worry… because no matter where I am or what I'm doing, my heart belongs to you."
Ehn/PC 6/2/2023 3:59 PM
She stares silently for a moment. "That’s… Alright. You don’t have to think exactly like me… I’d prefer it if there were only 1 of me around, haha-" She slaps her own face like Athena Cykes. "Sorry, I don’t know what’s gotten into me. Maybe I hit my head too hard in that closet." She looks around. "Did you see where Sam went? I need to help him."
Ashley Laurier 6/2/2023 4:45 PM
"No, sorry... I was kinda distracted."
Ehn/PC 6/2/2023 4:48 PM

Ashley Laurier 6/2/2023 5:12 PM
Tensing at the sound of Aura's voice, Ashley makes a face like someone's just insulted her. She moves closer to Autumn and tries to look away. "...Mm." (edited)

The words come out of her mouth quicker and angrier than she expected. She tries to cover it up with a smile. "But there's no problem here anyway, so it doesn't matter."

Ashley Laurier 6/12/2023 4:55 PM

You make me try sooo haaard to help you, go almost out of my mind thinking I can't get through to you no matter what I do, that I lost you to your own stupid insistence on never wanting anybody's help, but now it's 'Oh, Ashley, why are you feeling bad? Let's hang out, let's talk about your feelings!' Well, maybe YOU'RE the reason I don't want to talk about it! Maybe when I tried to do that over and over again and you kept acting like it didn't matter, you convinced me I COULDN'T anymore! And you want to turn back around on aaaaall that and tell me you're here to talk about it, the MOMENT I get tired of it! If it's really my attention you want so bad, I have nothing left to give. Ashley Laurier 6/15/2023 10:59 PM

Ehn/PC 6/15/2023 11:04 PM

Ashley Laurier 6/15/2023 11:58 PM

Ehn/PC 6/16/2023 12:14 AM
"I..." Autumn squirms uncomfortably. "Aura, let her go. She doesn't want to be your friend anymore. She's abandoned you. It's time you move on from that!" "..." Aura doesn't answer. "Come on, Ashley. We can't waste time on this." Autumn starts to leave again.
Ashley Laurier 6/16/2023 1:18 AM
How can she just say it like that? I was trying to let Aura down easy, and she comes in with– Ashley opens her mouth to say something to Autumn, maybe even to call her out, …but then closes it again. …She's just telling the truth though, isn't she? I really did abandon Aura. I've been doing nothing but letting her down. When Autumn dragged her out to the schoolyard on Wednesday, I was trying to cut her out of my life right then. No matter how I try to spin it, I keep fucking things up with her… Why am I even trying to sugarcoat it? "I'll ta–…" No, she definitely can't say 'talk to you later'. The last thing she needs is to talk to Aura more. It's not worth it when this happens every time. She just needs to leave. She tries to walk away with Autumn. (edited)

Ehn/PC 6/16/2023 1:49 AM
Ashley evades Aura. Aura just falls to her knees and gets into a begging position. "F-Fine...! I'll just speak in a language my besties can understand! Please please please let me back in! Please please please please please please please please-" Autumn tries to back up uncomfortably, but is blocked by Ashley hiding behind her. "Shut up!" She screams and kicks Aura away. Aura yelps and falls over backwards. Autumn takes a moment to breathe before suddenly realizing what she's done. She starts looking around anxiously, but there aren't too many people around. Autumn starts pathetically pleading to the uncaring bystanders. "I'm- I'm not a violent person! I don't- I don't do these kinds of things normally... Ashley can attest to that! I'm an excellent student and a great person... And- And I'm the least violent person you'll ever meet in your life! You might not know me yet... But I'm someone you can be proud of! Someone inspirational! But... Even the best of us have... Some slight overreactions! It's all just about moving past those! I promise!"
Ehn/PC 6/17/2023 2:03 PM
((Pleading eyes emoji))
Ashley Laurier 6/17/2023 3:21 PM
Before even the first word comes out of Autumn's mouth, Ashley can no longer hear her. She just stares expressionless at the scene in front of her, both a thousand miles away and far too close to be even remotely comfortable. She can't see what she's seeing. She can't believe her own eyes. Because if she does, if what she's seeing is real… then… You can't teach an old dog new tricks. And she certainly is a bitch, isn't she? The sound of that palm against Aura's face. Absolutely disgraceful. Aura falling over onto the ground. She grabs at her head, her face. It's about to split open. The world doesn't feel like it's working right– no, she isn't working right. She's the one with the problem. Everyone else is fine. Everything is fine. Aura, on the ground, hurt, again. Ashley backs away from Autumn quickly enough that she almost falls over. She becomes vaguely aware of the fact that she's sobbing and hyperventilating again, but it doesn't quite register to her as any more than a simple fact; not in comparison to the deep sense of wrongness threatening to engulf her entire self. Trying to focus on that, she immediately begins walking home with both of her hands still covering almost her whole face. She can barely see where she's going at all. That's okay.
Ehn/PC 6/17/2023 3:24 PM
Autumn reaches out instinctively, but quickly pulls her arm back in and heads in the opposite direction. Aura gets up and runs after Ashley. "Ashley!"
Ashley Laurier 6/17/2023 3:29 PM
Ashley starts walking faster, then breaks into a run. Hearing that voice, seeing that face, it makes the tears against her face feel warmer. It makes the people around her feel closer. It's horrible.
Ehn/PC 6/17/2023 3:30 PM
Aura tries to keep up.
3:34 PM
"Ashley! What’s wrong?" Aura. Ashley arrives home.
Ashley Laurier 6/17/2023 3:39 PM
She rushes into her room and closes the door, locking it behind her.
Ehn/PC 6/17/2023 3:44 PM
Aura keeps knocking on the door. "Ashley? Ashley!?" Ashley is alone in her room.
Ashley Laurier 6/17/2023 4:23 PM
In response to the noise calling out for her, Ashley takes the natural action of collapsing onto the floor and slamming her hands against her ears. After a few seconds, her eyes close too, seemingly on their own. She begs anyone who'll listen to let this not be happening. She hopes with everything in her soul that this isn't real, that she isn't real. She wishes to disappear with all her being.
Ehn/PC 6/17/2023 4:27 PM
Ashley falls asleep, and wakes up an hour later on her bed. She has an absurd amount of notifications.

Ashley Laurier 6/17/2023 7:19 PM

Ashley Laurier 6/17/2023 8:02 PM
As she scrolls through the results, she becomes increasingly frantic. How could this happen? Does she really deserve even this to be taken away from her? That person in those screenshots... that's not her. She at least knows that much. That's right. This isn't her. Despite herself, she breathes a sigh of relief, one that she doesn't really understand. But it's clear now. This is a setup built to work against her, and more likely than not, it was put in place as soon as she started getting that ridiculous number of followers. Obviously there's someone out to get her for some reason, and it's her job to figure out who they are and how to stop them. It's as simple as that. She'll have to make an alt of her own, one that's distinct enough from her main that it doesn't register as the same person. She wouldn't want to have to abandon online spaces entirely, after all, even if her presence will indeed have to become more minimal. Based on the time all this started happening, she can at least rule out some people... probably. Well, she'll have to think about it later. But it's something new to solve. Someone new to beat. It feels... good. Ashley briefly wonders if she is going insane by enjoying watching her life fall apart. Nope, she doesn't dwell on that. Time to check her texts from Autumn.

Having to type this out feels a little ridiculous– surely Autumn knows about LGBTQ+ people, right?? She's literally talked about being Ashley's girlfriend before. "That’s true. I could. But both of these sound pretty much exclusively like advantages for you… What do I get out of this? I may be generous, but I’m not a free dispenser."
Ashley Laurier 6/17/2023 11:18 PM
Well, damn… this thing makes a tough deal. She smiles. "Did you have anything in mind you wanted done? As long as it doesn't get in the way of her and I, you could more or less ask anything of me. I'm a pretty selfless person, after all."
Ehn/PC 6/17/2023 11:19 PM
She starts to laugh loudly.
Ashley Laurier 6/17/2023 11:45 PM
Somewhat late into this conversation, Ashley remembers that this is a creature which so far has seemingly existed for the sole purpose of making her suffer. So its laughter puts her a little on edge. "…Did I say something funny…?" (edited)
Ehn/PC 6/17/2023 11:47 PM
She just laughs even louder. It’s not creepy or maniacal, it just feels mocking. "…Ahhh. Please, tell me how you justify this one to yourself. How is brainwashing your girlfriend to love you actually heroic. I’m dying to know what your brain has cooked up."
Ashley Laurier 6/18/2023 12:38 AM

"I'm not… I don't… Oh, fuck, don't… don't give this to me. I don't want it anymore." Her hand goes to her mouth in revulsion. (edited)
Ehn/PC 6/18/2023 12:42 AM

Ashley Laurier 6/19/2023 11:04 PM
After a minute or two of sniffling and generally feeling awful, she angrily wipes her tears from her eyes with her sleeve. When am I just going to learn how to act like a normal fucking person? It's like this every time: I get to have something nice, I INSTANTLY ruin it by being a narcissistic selfish asshole, and then I go and cry like a baby about it because I feel sorry for myself. I hate myself just for thinking about it. Why was I even born, as this pathetic, miserable fucking thing who can never do anything right, and then I think I should get to have every single little thing I want without question? I don't deserve Autumn. I don't deserve anyone. Autumn should be allowed to be happy, to live a wonderful life with a girl who knows what she actually wants, who can actually give her the love her very existence should owe her. But she's stuck with me. Whose only impact on other people's lives is ruining them. She should just leave me for my own sake. For both our sakes. Why can't I just… I should've just… done the right thing. Ashley checks her texts with Autumn to see if there's any new messages.

Does she really even have a reason to exist anymore? The thought makes her laugh a little. Turning her phone off and putting it in her pocket, she decides to head down to the kitchen to make herself something light for dinner. Ehn/PC 7/11/2023 7:31 PM

Ashley Laurier 7/11/2023 8:52 PM
%#+&@/>} Ashley Laurier spontaneously combusts into a spray of acid that splatters all over the floor and walls, immediately killing her. It takes her a moment– one that feels like an eternity– to process reality again enough to understand that that didn't actually happen. The world's welcome-back gift to her is a heart that burns at a thousand degrees with every human emotion possible to experience, plus a few more that register as alien emotions trying to communicate with her in some incomprehensible cosmic language. It weighs her down terribly, threatening to pull her into the earth, as the rest of her body fades away into nothingness. No, not nothingness. This is Ashley's body still. Autumn Peterson is kissing Ashley Laurier. Like it's something she'd do on a whim, like it's just something she does every day. Why? Doesn't she understand that the girl she's kissing is filthy, that doing something like this will ruin her perfect lips, her gorgeous face, her as-yet-unstained body…? It's a shame to allow something like that to kiss someone, the way it contaminates them and eats them alive and isn't even dignified enough to spit out the bones. Its beating heart cries in anguish, for all the love it wants to hold, and for all that it does not. It screams to be quieted, for it to end, and yet to last forever. Does Autumn know that? Is she brave enough to withstand it? Maybe that's why she's better than everyone else. Only she could think of doing this, this kiss, kissing this person, and coming out untainted, as if that itself was her gesture of charity, her kiss washing away the dirt and the darkness and mending the gaps and creating something pure. As if to show that miracles really do exist. All of the little contradictions dimming and all of the cacophonies silencing themselves and all of the thoughts being left behind and all of the self being violated and all of the things becoming one and nothing and everything and all of I love you… It feels so good… If only I'd been a little bit faster… You're so mean… You're so mean… You're so mean… You're so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean… That's so mean…
Ehn/PC 7/11/2023 9:01 PM
"Umm… You didn’t ask her for permission! What if she doesn’t want that!?" Aura. Autumn doesn’t respond, and instead breaks from the kiss. "Ah, I always wanted to do that. What kind of god breaks down just from 2 girls kissing? If that’s all it took, I’ve officially bested an entire religion. What a joke." She shrugs smugly and keeps walking.
Ashley Laurier 7/11/2023 9:08 PM
Somebody else in the room is unable to support her own weight and promptly collapses onto the floor.
Ehn/PC 7/11/2023 9:11 PM

Ashley Laurier 7/15/2023 9:45 PM
Starting to feel like herself again, Ashley tries to say something to Aura, but only manages a shaky and incoherent string of syllables. She puts her hand to her mouth, her lips, where- STOP thinking about it, stop thinking about it, stop thinking about it, stop thinking about it. Autumn herself seems a million miles away now. Of course it could've been anyone… Of course she… She wouldn't…
Ehn/PC 7/15/2023 9:47 PM

Do I want to spend what might be my last day just trying to have fun? It's absurd. I don't know what I want to do. This shouldn't be happening. (edited)

She's trying to send everyone who she thinks should be a protagonist back to Avengard for whatever nonsense politics are happening back there! I tried to leave, and guess what? Ashley Laurier 7/23/2023 5:11 PM

"You don't just... become a different person by falling for someone. M-Maybe they'd influence you a little, but... you should still feel able to be yourself! Otherwise, what's... what's the point?!"
Ehn/PC 7/23/2023 5:14 PM
"…What do you know about love?" Ehn.
Ashley Laurier 7/23/2023 5:29 PM
It's like a slap in the face. Come on, Ashley. What are you doing, getting so worked up about just a little question like that? You know what love is, don't you? "I know a lot more than you think I do! I know I've been in love with this girl since the moment I met her. And I know I'm not perfect, or even average– I'm an embarrassment of a person, and even despite all that, she still goes out of her way for me, to show me she needs me... That's what love is! If I was just some perfect lover for her like this, it wouldn't mean anything...! We don't just love each other when we're acting pretty. We're there for each other as people, issues and all!"
Ehn/PC 7/23/2023 5:33 PM
"Are you implying Autumn isn’t perfect?" Ehn.
Ashley Laurier 7/23/2023 5:40 PM
"N-No, but...! Ugh, you don't get it at all! This isn't... This is like some shitty cishet man's idea of what a 'perfect' girlfriend is. They wouldn't understand what makes her beautiful the way I do, and clearly you wouldn't either. Just... Just stop trying to change her personality in the first place. Why are you even doing that?!"
Ehn/PC 7/23/2023 5:44 PM
"I’m just doing what you want!" Ehn. Autumn places her hand on Ashley’s shoulder gently. "It’s okay, Ashley."
Ashley Laurier 7/23/2023 5:48 PM

Ehn/PC 7/23/2023 5:54 PM
Autumn lifts up Ashley’s chin and stares into her eyes. "Kiss me, Ashley."
Ashley Laurier 7/23/2023 6:22 PM
A revolting warmth flares up inside her. "That's... hhaahh....." For the first time, the sensation of her self melting away ceases to feel good. It's suddenly horrifying, unbearable. Why is she letting this happen to her? I can't...! I have to tell her I don't want this... I can't want this... So why is it so hard for me to say that? It's not even HER! This is just some caricature of a loving girlfriend, some... some facsimile of affection, a hyper-idealized plaything who lives and breathes validation. That can't be the only thing I'm attracted to! There HAS to be more! Would I just make out with a wall as long as someone painted Autumn's face on it?! Am I really that shameless...? I have to think. There has to be more that I love her for. There has to...!
Ehn/PC 7/23/2023 6:24 PM
"Ashley. Don’t hesitate. Take what you want." Autumn.
Ashley Laurier 7/23/2023 6:42 PM
She finally makes eye contact with Autumn. What I want... Then, she closes her eyes. All at once, her answer is decided upon. She takes Autumn's hand in her own, gently removing it from her chin, and steps backwards. "I... want you to hate me. Please...?"
Ehn/PC 7/23/2023 6:43 PM
"What?" Ehn.
Ashley Laurier 7/23/2023 7:00 PM
Yes. "I want you to hate me!" Ashley repeats it louder, the comforting feeling of her wish wrapping itself around her. "No matter how hard I try, I want it not to be enough. I want to fall over and hurt myself, and I want you to call me a disappointment before you'd ever think of helping me to my feet. Whenever I'm with you, I hope it's on borrowed time, and I hope you'd rather be with anyone else if only I wasn't so easy for you to use. I hope you only pay me as much attention as you would an ant. I hope I spend the rest of my life trying to figure out some way to get you to like me even the tiniest bit more, to care about me in some way I already know you never will, and I want it to all be for nothing. Okay?" (edited)
Ehn/PC 7/23/2023 7:06 PM

No- No, she's probably just saying things she doesn't mean because she's emotional. Ashley knows the feeling. Ashley Laurier 9/2/2023 9:39 PM
Oh, right. Great. In place of that, she considers what else she could do to keep herself occupied. Could she maybe message Aura about things? No, she's… not in a good enough place for that. Thomas is off the list as soon as he comes to mind– there's basically no doubt in Ashley's mind that he still just actually hates her, and the feeling is pretty much mutual. As for her parents, she'd feel more uplifted if she tried making an imaginary friend to talk to. Not that her childhood was without those. She'd miss them a lot more if she didn't know better than to believe they're real now that she's older. Stupid, stupid, stupid. She's sitting here trying to distract herself and reminisce while Autumn is like this now because of her? She needs to take some fucking responsibility. Ashley Laurier 9/6/2023 10:40 PM
Reading these messages feels like a sucker punch to the chest. Since when did she ask for... this? Yeah, she wanted Autumn to be in love with her, as shitty as that was, but the idea that this was the kind of 'love' she wanted, that this... Fuck, is she getting off on this?? Is she happy that Autumn would rather commit suicide than be without her??? And… FUCK, she's just playing into this fucking horrible idea of love by being like this, by reaffirming to the girl she loves that every lover she'll have is going to treat her like this. Autumn, who was already convinced she was only allowed to fall in love with boys… who every boy in their class probably has their eye on anyways, thinking fucking disgusting things like this about her, probably fantasizing about this exact kind of depraved shit with her… Ashley's just another one of them. Just another reason this girl will end up thinking that this is the only kind of 'love' she can ever hope for. Ashley wished for this. It isn't until the pain in her chest gets tighter than usual that she realizes her phone is on her bed, having fallen out of her hands. Her hands, which are now wrapped around– Oh, she's choking herself. That isn't good. Okay… focus on the phone. She has to say what Autumn needs to hear right now. One shaking hand reaches for her phone to type something on its keyboard. Her finger presses down on the first letter. She passes out.
Ehn/PC 9/6/2023 10:40 PM
((End chapter))
Advehnt Guard
ehn-pc
Ehn/PC 12/4/2022 8:31 PM
7: Associated Gangsters
