Advehnt Guard
Other Town / ashley-laurier
Ehn/PC 9/6/2023 10:41 PM
Ashley wakes up in her bed the next morning, for real this time. "Ashley...?" Raymond calls out to her from outside the room.
Ashley Laurier 9/6/2023 11:11 PM
She takes in a gasp of breath and wipes some of the cold sweat off her forehead. Did she forget to breathe while she was asleep? Did she- No, don't think about that dream. Do anything but that. You are Ashley Laurier, waking up on a normal day in your normal life. "Oh! Morning, dad! What's up?" she calls back while getting out of bed and going through her closet for clothes to wear today. She becomes dimly aware that she's been wearing the same clothes for the past couple of days. Her heart sinks a little. ……But it's okay! Today she'll put herself together better than before, and she's going to have a good day.
Ehn/PC 9/6/2023 11:11 PM
"Please come downstairs. Your uh... Your mother and I need to talk to you."
Ashley Laurier 9/6/2023 11:19 PM
She's going to have a good day. She's going to have a good day. She's going to have a good day. She's going to have a good day. "A-Alright. Is it okay if I take a shower first?" She lays her selected clothes out on her bed.
Ehn/PC 9/6/2023 11:19 PM
"Oh, uh... Right that. Well, we do have a guest. So like, yeah..." The sounds of his leaving footsteps can be heard.
Ashley Laurier 9/6/2023 11:50 PM
"Um-…" Ashley trails off, now unable to ask for clarification about that statement. Well, it's probably fine if she just takes a shower now, no huge deal. Not like she takes a super long time in there. After leaving her room and grabbing a towel from the hallway closet, she closes the door to the bathroom behind her, takes off the clothes in which she spent the last… however many days in, and turns the water on as she steps into the shower.
Ehn/PC 9/6/2023 11:50 PM
This happens.
Ashley Laurier 9/11/2023 11:00 PM
Her thoughts end up turning to her friends, inevitably. They're… certainly not pleasant thoughts. It isn't fun being caught in some kind of issue with her three closest friends, regardless of whoever's fault it is. (Well, in Autumn's case it's absolutely 100% not Autumn's fault, but that much is already obvious.) But what she needs to focus on right now isn't how bad things are going– she needs to think about how she can make everything better. Fixing things is what she does best. That being said, I don't exactly know how to actually DO that. I can't remember the last time I was in any situation this hard to resolve, let alone three of them at once. Have I really fucked things so far beyond repair that- Not helping. Not helping. Maybe what I need to do is think about this from a different angle? How bad is what's happening to me right now, really? All I need to do is find a way to make it seem more manageable, and then maybe I'll feel better about dealing with it… Well, it's not the first time Autumn's been upset with me, right? Even before this week, we've had our share of… disagreements where she does something I feel weird about, but I have to be the one to apologize afterwards for the stupid reactions I end up having. And what's always happened, every time? We make up and stay friends, don't we? Even if things are different now, even if I tried to be… more than friends with her, I've made stupid mistakes like that before. Autumn is kind. Too kind, maybe… But I have to believe that this can just be water under the bridge like all the other times and that things can go back to normal. I have to try, at least. The Twitter thing, too… Definitely not the first time someone's come after me there, right? Like, obviously never on this scale, but I'm not on Twitter for the million other strangers I don't know who only just followed me this week. I'm there for my oomfies like Junie! And Avery! And Lio! They've been there for me since the start anyways, and I'm sure the others'd get it like Junie did if I explained what's going on to them. Not even the first time someone in our circle's had to remake an account after shitty drama– like, that time Lio had to remake when freaks from one of her old fandoms were harassing her and got her old account suspended. It's just like that! I should just make a new account and DM everyone I still want to add on there. Mm, but I'll have to change my username… I really liked loveloveguilty… She shrugs off the thought somewhat dejectedly. And, well, Aura… ……. Ashley suddenly notices the shower has been running for a pretty long time! Oops! Spurred out of her thoughts by this, she quickly finishes washing herself and turns the shower off. She steps out and hastily dries herself off with the towel while trying to listen to any noise outside the bathroom through the door. (edited)
Ehn/PC 9/11/2023 11:02 PM
It’s silent.
Ashley Laurier 9/11/2023 11:21 PM
Damn. Wrapping the towel around her, Ashley hurries back through the hallway into her room and gets dressed as fast as she can, blowdries her hair for probably less time than is necessary to get it fully dry, and otherwise hastily gets ready for her day. She feels bad keeping whoever's downstairs waiting, but she really wants to not neglect her health today. She'll just apologize when she gets down there! With that, she swings open the door to her room and practically flies downstairs.
Ehn/PC 9/11/2023 11:22 PM
Father Morgan is seated at the dining room, along with Ashley’s parents. He looks fairly confused, while the other 2 look very serious. "Please take a seat, Ashley." Lilia.
Ashley Laurier 9/11/2023 11:25 PM
Huh? Her stomach drops. Why is he here? "Uh… Ah, alright!" She tries to act natural. Shit, she forgot to apologize for the wait.
Ehn/PC 9/11/2023 11:27 PM
"We heard the details about what happened yesterday from your friend, Autumn." Raymond. "It’s… Made it clear to us that we clearly haven’t done a good enough job raising you." Lilia.
Ashley Laurier 9/11/2023 11:33 PM
"Haha, what?" She can feel herself growing more nervous by the second. "I mean, I think you guys are pretty good..."
Ehn/PC 9/11/2023 11:35 PM
"No. No, we’re not… Ashley. But… We’d like it if you heard us out and understood our side. Why we’ve never been very good parents." Raymond. "When we had you… We weren’t ready for a child. We didn’t want one. We’ve just… Never known how to raise one." Lilia.
Ashley Laurier 9/11/2023 11:37 PM
"........" Ashley falls silent.
Ehn/PC 9/11/2023 11:42 PM
"We wanted to let you grow on your own, but that’s clearly not working." Lilia. "Yeah, well… I personally don’t think I would’ve ended up arrested. But like your mother said… We don’t know how to raise a child. It’s not really our fault." Raymond. "We don’t want you to suffer because of us, though… So we brought the father here to save you. We’re repaying our mistake, so don’t feel guilty." Lilia.
Ashley Laurier 9/11/2023 11:55 PM
FUUUCCKK. She KNEW IT. "Wh-! That's..." She looks desperately over at Morgan for his reaction to this, in place of words. He doesn't want to do this any more than she does, right? Right?? (edited)
Ehn/PC 9/11/2023 11:57 PM
Father Morgan very clearly does not. "Yes, umm… Well." He prays half-heartedly. "Your sins are absolved… And such."
Ashley Laurier 9/12/2023 12:09 AM
Phew. "Um, th-thank you!" She bows, then realizes that's probably not what you're supposed to do in response. Whatever, it's a show of respect, right?
Ehn/PC 9/12/2023 12:11 AM
"Right." Father Morgan turns to them. "This… Doesn’t really solve the larger problems, you know?" "Well, she’s old enough. She’ll find someone…" Raymond. Autumn suddenly strolled right into the house. "Oh… Am I interrupting something?"
Ashley Laurier 9/12/2023 3:44 PM
Ashley jolts in her seat, immediately forgetting whatever she was going to think or say in response to her dad. "Autumn!" She scrambles to stand up. "Uh, hi! It's fine! To be here, I mean. Regardless of, whether you were, interrupting something." Ohhh my god, stay calm.
Ehn/PC 9/12/2023 3:47 PM
"Great. Can you come with me, Ashley?" Autumn smiles as usual. "Well, we were kind of in the middle of something…" Raymond. "No, no… I think we’re all done." Father Morgan says uncomfortably.
Ashley Laurier 9/12/2023 4:04 PM
"Sure!" She is so, so weak to that smile. Any hope the others in the room had of her actually taking in what they're saying is gone now. (edited)
Ehn/PC 9/12/2023 4:06 PM
"Good." Autumn walks out.
Ashley Laurier 9/12/2023 4:07 PM
Ashley follows her without any hesitation.
Ehn/PC 9/12/2023 4:08 PM
"Ashley-" Lilia's voice is cut off by the door closing. Autumn walks into the forest.
Ashley Laurier 9/12/2023 4:30 PM
Huh. "Hey, why are we heading here?" Ashley asks, still following her nonetheless.
Ehn/PC 9/12/2023 4:31 PM
Autumn doesn’t answer.
Ashley Laurier 9/12/2023 7:16 PM
She fidgets a little uncomfortably, but keeps going. "Oh! Um, I've been thinking about what happened, you know, yesterday... Look, I know the way I've been acting lately has been pretty dumb. I feel like I've embarrassed you more in the past week than in the entire rest of my life… I think it's because I've been scared of losing what we have, haha…" She clears her throat. "A-Anyways, I just woke up from a pretty rough dream this morning. And it made me think… maybe I need to stop worrying about that kind of thing. Maybe I should try to trust that we can work things out together, instead of worrying about messing everything up all the time. Since, well, I think trying to correct for that just makes everything worse."
Ehn/PC 9/12/2023 7:19 PM
Autumn doesn’t say anything and keeps smiling as she walks, but her hand grips into a fist.
Ashley Laurier 9/12/2023 7:42 PM
"I mean, if you're upset by anything I'm doing, I'll definitely listen!" Ashley doesn't notice Autumn making a fist, but hastily adds this anyway. "It's not like I want to totally stop looking out for any mistakes I might make or anything– it's just, like, we shouldn't default to stressing ourselves out about problems we could solve if we worked together, right?" She hesitates. "Um, if that's okay with you, of course."
Ehn/PC 9/12/2023 7:43 PM
Autumn abruptly changes the subject. "Do you believe in the death penalty?"
Ashley Laurier 9/12/2023 8:17 PM
"Do I- Huh?" The question catches her off guard. Of all the things for Autumn to say, she certainly didn't expect this. "Uhhh... I guess? But I think it's something probably only the worst of the worst deserve. Like, yeah, the world would probably be a lot happier without bigots and pedophiles and all, but a lot of people do bad things for reasons that don't deserve death. Most of the time, I think people... probably aren't that bad."
Ehn/PC 9/12/2023 8:30 PM
"…I don’t." Autumn stops once they reach the top of a small cliff that overlooks the rest of the forest. "…It’s too kind to them. They get to escape all of the consequences of their actions… Never feeling a shred of the pain they inflict on other people. They just sit back… And escape all the pain of living. It’s too much of a kindness… For someone like you." Autumn grabs Ashley’s shoulders and stares into her eyes. It’s the same usual expression she’s always given her.
Ashley Laurier 9/28/2023 10:17 PM
Ashley feels like there's something wrong. Like it was always there, but she's just now noticing it. It's hard to tell whether it's her or the entire rest of her life instead. What? That doesn't even make sense. But what Autumn's saying doesn't make sense either... If she's looking at me just like normal, and she's touching me just like normal, shouldn't that make me happy? Today was supposed to be a normal day... She does her best nerve-wracked impression of a smile. "Wh... What do you mean? Hey, are you... Are you feeling okay? We're going to be okay, right?" She doesn't understand why she's saying this. It shouldn't be scary, right? (edited)
Ehn/PC 9/28/2023 10:22 PM
Autumn turns her around until she faces the ground below. "I understand why you’d want this, you know? To just fall and let it all fade away. But you don’t deserve it. You don’t have my permission to kill yourself, do you understand that? You can’t die yet." She grimaces. "…Because you haven’t paid enough. This sort of thing is reserved for good people."
Ashley Laurier 10/5/2023 8:11 PM
That familiar tingling feeling whenever she looks over a big drop creeps up through her hands into the rest of her body. "Hhkh-" She tries to say something back, something quick and painless to deny it, but her voice catches in her throat and she only gets out a struggling intake of breath. Obviously this is what she's wanted this whole time. Even when she hasn't been consciously thinking about it, the feeling has stuck around inside of her for... for... how long? Oh, fuck, she doesn't want to think about 'how long'. She doesn't want to think about any of this. Why can't it just be easier? Now that she's staring over the edge of the cliff, she realizes she doesn't want to kill herself. It's too much of a choice, too real, and Autumn's right, she can't... allow herself to decide that. If only she didn't have to choose. If only she was already dead. If only she'd never been here in the first place. Ashley's body moves on its own, turning around and lurching forward to grab Autumn in a desperate hug.
Ehn/PC 10/5/2023 8:13 PM
Autumn is too shocked to stop it, but she doesn't hug Ashley back. "...What exactly do you think you're doing?"
Ashley Laurier 10/5/2023 8:53 PM
The guilt sets back in with a sting. Her hug becomes a lot looser, but she's still faintly holding on. "You said that... I don't have your permission. So... does that mean that if I- if I fell backwards right now, you'd... ...?" Her sentence slowly devolves into muffled mumbling out of embarrassment.
Ehn/PC 10/5/2023 8:54 PM
"It means you're not allowed to die." She looks down at Ashley angrily. "I know what you did, Ashley. Why you came to this town to spread your poison."
Ashley Laurier 10/5/2023 9:10 PM
"What?" Ah, there's the guilt in full force again. As though her hands were being burned, she lifts them off Autumn's body and steps back, putting all of her focus on following instructions. Don't die. Maybe if she stops being so fucking clingy and pathetic like this, it'll get better. It was just a hug. She hasn't ruined the conversation yet.
Ehn/PC 10/5/2023 9:12 PM
"Your parents told me. Right from the start. Did you really think you could trick me like that? That I'd ever believe you loved me? You're a horrible liar."
Ashley Laurier 10/5/2023 9:48 PM
"Wait, what? Wait- wait, wait, wait!! What do you mean 'trick you'?! Autumn, it's not a lie that I'm in love with you! What did my parents say to make you believe that??"
Ehn/PC 10/5/2023 9:49 PM
"Stop trying to trick me! You're a horrible person and you know it! You ruined my life!"
Ashley Laurier 10/7/2023 11:30 PM
.......... The silence that follows is complete and all-consuming to a point where it's difficult to register or describe. Nothingness erupts from her mouth at a rate too slow to expel all of the screaming emptiness inside her head. All the world around her becomes hollow, even as she still sees her surroundings with agonizing clarity. Words don't feel real anymore, either. If Autumn's saying something to her still, she certainly can't make out what it is, let alone respond. Why does it have to be like this? If it's like this, why does Autumn want her to live at all?
Ehn/PC 10/7/2023 11:39 PM
"...Don't try to deny it! Every single day of my life you pretended to be my friend while you ruined my life! And now... Now you made Sam leave! The only person who... The only person..." Her attempts to get the words out seem almost like vomiting. Eventually she gives up. "So now... Now you're going to live. Whether you want to or not."
Ehn/PC 10/7/2023 11:48 PM
Autumn turns away and leaves. Each step is slow and hesitant. (edited)
Ashley Laurier 10/9/2023 11:08 PM
No. She can't let her walk away again. "Wait!" It's a short, desperate noise that almost sounds more like the cry of an animal than a word from the English language.
Ehn/PC 10/9/2023 11:10 PM
Autumn keeps walking away. "That didn't go very well." Ehn spoke up from behind Ashley.
Ashley Laurier 10/9/2023 11:21 PM
A louder, even less human noise leaves Ashley's mouth as she instinctively twists her body around to throw a furious punch in the direction of that THING'S voice.
Ehn/PC 10/9/2023 11:22 PM
It just strikes through Ehn and hits the ground. Ehn gives a performative "Ouch."
Ashley Laurier 10/10/2023 12:14 AM
As usual, all the accumulated pain causes her to crumple to the ground. And, as usual, she starts crying again. She doesn't let Ehn hear her sob. At least she can deny it that satisfaction. "WHAT THE FUCK IS YOUR PROBLEM?!" she screams. Today was supposed to be fucking normal! She was supposed to fucking work things out!!! Why can't she kill herself? She has to kill herself so badly that her mind starts racing through all the ways she could do it. It's just the tiniest bit soothing to imagine it– the pain coursing through her, the release, the blood dripping down her body. A welcome distraction that feels even the tiniest bit like it could solve anything. But it can't. She can't, because she's trapped here. In this body and world that both hate her as much as she hates them. Of course she couldn't make anything go back to normal when it never was in the first place, all because of her. She wants to tear the heads off the shoulders of every fucking person that hurt her and the ones she loved to make things this way. She wants to explode into infinitely tiny pieces that become dust in the wind. She struggles to stand up. Her breathing is quick and on fire; every limb she has is shaking. She tries to stand up.
Ehn/PC 10/10/2023 12:17 AM
"Is that any way to treat your benefactor? Really, I’ve done nothing to make you hate me."
Ashley Laurier 10/10/2023 12:25 AM
She glares at it with the fury of a hundred suns. If it'd given her the ability to kill people by looking at them, there's no doubt in her mind that it would be a miserable white stain on the ground by now. No, it wouldn't even exist. She has to figure out a way to kill this fucking thing. "What… the fuck… do you want." Her words vibrate with anger. Fuck, that's just her voice shaking. Fuck. (edited)
Ehn/PC 10/10/2023 12:37 AM
"To help you, obviously!"
Ashley Laurier 10/10/2023 12:39 AM
It takes all she has to not take another swing at it. "Wh-What are you talking about??"
Ehn/PC 10/10/2023 12:40 AM
"It may surprise your shallow perception of me, but I do actually pity you, y’know?"
Ashley Laurier 10/10/2023 12:52 AM
"I don't want your pity. Go waste it on someone else."
Ehn/PC 10/10/2023 12:55 AM
She groans. "The point is… I’ll let you skip to the end, without all the drama. I can tell you where to go to solve all your problems. Aura’s family, Autumn’s… emotions. I’ll even skip the actual specific instructions because we both already know you’d ignore them anyway." (edited)
Ashley Laurier 10/10/2023 1:22 AM
"Aura's-?" She shakes her head. "No, you still think I want to 'solve' Autumn's emotions?! Even after what happened the last time you suggested that?! And you still think you understand me well enough to tell me what to do. You're damn right I wouldn't follow any of your instructions when all they've done is make my life worse!"
Ehn/PC 10/10/2023 1:25 AM
"So you want Autumn to be that upset with you forever? I’m not telling you to brainwash her, which you ASKED me for by the way… You have me to thank for you not doing something that stupid. I’m saying you can convince her you’re a good person. There are no problems in this universe that weren’t designed to be solvable. If you didn’t already believe in that, then no wonder you hate god so much."
Ashley Laurier 10/12/2023 12:11 AM
"......" Ashley stops to think about this. The smug little asshole is always up to something, so there's no doubt it's got an ulterior motive up its sleeve here too. The problem is... she doesn't have many other options, and as much as she hates to admit it, Ehn hasn't always been out to ruin her life specifically. And... well... it IS true that Ehn stopped her from fucking everything up with Autumn before. Aaauughhh, this is so fucking impossible to deal with!!! What if she's just been hallucinating this happening to her all this time, somehow? What if Sam talking to her about this thing was just something she made up, and everything she did with any kind of superpowers was fake, too? "...You're saying you're not gonna be doing any mind control this time?"
Ehn/PC 10/12/2023 12:14 AM
"All I’m telling you to do… Is to go to Avengard, and meet with someone. That person’s ability is all you’ll need to fix things! I don’t much care if you make friends with the owner or steal it, it should be entertaining either way."
Ashley Laurier 10/12/2023 7:54 PM
"Hey, that's not what I asked! Tell me you're not going to work your mind control powers on me or anyone else!" What kind of directions even are those, anyway?! There's no way I can just pick whoever this person is out of a crowd! (edited)
Ehn/PC 10/12/2023 7:57 PM
"I obviously can't promise that. Without those favors, I might as well not exist. And you can stop worrying about yourself, I already had to waste your favor. I can't just control you again."
Ashley Laurier 10/14/2023 2:22 PM
"So at least I'll be safe… probably…" she mutters to herself. Ugh, she'd do anything for a simple, straightforward, reliable set of instructions right about now. If Autumn was here to tell her how to fix things, she'd tell Ashley exactly what to do and exactly how to do it, and it'd be perfect. She wishes she could just have Autumn tell her what to do again. It's all she can do to just… try this and hope it works… Even if… "If you want me to head all the way to Avengard, can't you at least tell me who I'm supposed to be looking for? Starting this search across Avengard without a name is like telling me to find a needle in a haystack."
Ehn/PC 10/14/2023 2:23 PM
"Oh I'll tell you when you get there, don't worry. I just enjoy the suspense." She smirked.
Ashley Laurier 10/14/2023 5:47 PM
Ashley rolls her eyes in exasperation. "And you expect me to get there how, exactly? 'Hey mom and dad! I know everything I've done lately makes you disappointed in me and you just tried to hand me off to the church to fix me, but how about we take a trip back to the most miserable place I've ever lived?!' You think that'll go over well??"
Ehn/PC 10/14/2023 5:50 PM
"Call a taxi, or take the bus… Who cares? That’s not the hard part."
Ashley Laurier 10/14/2023 10:28 PM
"So you just... want me to go there alone?" Considering things logically, even if her parents did head there with her, they probably wouldn't look out for her enough for it to matter anyways. But the thought of being by herself in that place... If she was being honest, it was terrifying. For more reasons than just the potential loneliness. At least if her parents were there, maybe they'd annoy her enough to distract her.
Ehn/PC 10/14/2023 10:35 PM
"Not… Quite. You have to bring someone. That’s the hard part." Ehn jumps up on Ashley’s shoulder and whispers into her ear. "Do you think your words alone could get Aura to follow you?"
Ashley Laurier 10/15/2023 5:24 PM
Instinctively, Ashley tries to shake Ehn off of her. "What?! That's- No, she… Her parents would probably kill her if I had her leave home again. Assuming they- that they…" Assuming they didn't already, right? That's what you'd say if you weren't too spineless to even think about it.
Ehn/PC 10/15/2023 5:40 PM
"Well, that’s why you have to bring her! Once you have that ability, you’ll be able to resolve everything and keep her away from them."
Ashley Laurier 10/15/2023 9:26 PM
Would that work? She thinks about how eager Aura was to follow her to the church the other day. ...Maybe it would. If everything's riding on this, do either of us have any other choice? The longer I wait to make a decision, the worse everything's going to get... so even if I wait here longer to find a better solution, the result might just end up being the same as what'd happen if I come back from Avengard empty-handed. Besides, saving Aura from her family AND convincing Autumn to come around on me at the same time is something I don't know if I'd ever figure out myself. But... there's no way this doesn't come with a catch. Even if this does end up helping me out, there's no fucking way that Ehn is doing this out of the kindness of its heart. It has to have something it wants to achieve by sending me on this errand, and I need to figure it out before I play right into its hands. Maybe I don't have a choice besides going through with this, but there could still be a way to avoid completely playing into its hands. Or... paws. Whatever. I wish this could've at least been brought up yesterday. With school tomorrow, I'll only have this one day to head over to Avengard and meet whoever Ehn's talking about before I catch a bus back here. I can't afford to miss anything... If there's anything I have to do without making a single mistake, it's this. For the first time in this conversation, she looks Ehn in the eyes. "This is something I can do within the day, right?"
Ehn/PC 10/15/2023 9:35 PM
"Well, I guess that depends on how fast you are. But really, what’s a day going to change? You really think your parents are going to care to check if you show up at school tomorrow or something? You could vanish for a decade and they wouldn’t notice." Ehn hops around to her other shoulder. "You know… You’re sort of a genius. In the only way that counts, really. You’ve learned empathy and the desire to help people… Don’t you know that’s the most important lesson of all? What else is school gonna teach you that you need so badly? I never went to school, and I’m the smartest person I’ve ever met! The only thing that’s waiting at school for you tomorrow if you haven’t completed this is an even more upset Autumn." She looks Ashley in the eyes as well. "Of course… None of that will matter if you’re quick enough."
Ashley Laurier 10/19/2023 5:34 PM
"I..." Ashley tries not to let her reaction to that show on her face. "I didn't ask for your opinion. Maybe you don't have to worry about the consequences of not going to school, but I do. It's not about whether I'm getting anything out of it." Mentally, she runs through a list of the things she'll probably need for this trip. Something to defend herself with... Enough money to pay for a trip there and back, which she's pretty sure she does have... Actually... "Before I go, can you tell me what happened to my jacket? That'd probably be the most useful thing I could bring."
Ehn/PC 10/19/2023 5:36 PM
"Hmm… Would that be cheating…?" Ehn thinks. "Eh, why not. Autumn took it. Good luck convincing her to give it back when she’s like this though."
Ashley Laurier 10/19/2023 6:07 PM
That... makes sense, I guess. "Whatever. I don't need it for this anyways." It's now or never, then. "Anything else you wanna tell me before I go?"
Ehn/PC 10/19/2023 6:09 PM
"Nope." She stays on Ashley's shoulder.
Ashley Laurier 10/19/2023 6:11 PM
"Ugh, can you at least go away for now then?"
Ehn/PC 10/19/2023 6:12 PM
"That's... Not how it works."
Ashley Laurier 10/19/2023 9:38 PM
"What do you mean that's not- Fucking, whatever. Stay if that's what you want!" She throws up her hands in exasperation before starting to run back to her house. (edited)
Ehn/PC 10/19/2023 9:39 PM
Ehn follows until Ashley gets back into town, at which point she finally hops off and leaves. Ashley arrives back at her house.
Ashley Laurier 10/19/2023 11:49 PM
Upon making it back home, she starts looking through the windows to check if her parents are still inside. (edited)
Ehn/PC 10/19/2023 11:52 PM
They don't seem to be,
Ashley Laurier 10/20/2023 12:11 AM
…Alright. Still, she tries to enter as quietly as possible in case they're still around. She carefully looks around the house as she walks towards the drawer in the kitchen with all the knives.
Ehn/PC 10/20/2023 12:12 AM
She finds the drawer with millions knives.
Ashley Laurier 10/20/2023 12:13 AM
Her parents still aren't nearby, right?
Ehn/PC 10/20/2023 12:13 AM
They don’t seem to be.
Ashley Laurier 10/20/2023 12:15 AM
As efficiently as she can, she takes the sharpest knife she can find from the drawer, closes it, and heads for her room holding it nonchalantly by her side.
Ehn/PC 10/20/2023 12:15 AM
Her room looks normal. No one is inside.
Ashley Laurier 10/21/2023 10:18 PM
That's good, at least… She carefully places the knife in an easily-unzippable pocket in the front of her backpack. It's okay. I'm not going to have to use it. As she's doing this, she realizes for the first time that she never took out the gas mask or the bowling ball. Shit. Well, the mask isn't too bad at least, but the bowling ball is another story. With any luck, the school probably won't have assumed theft over only one missing ball, but now she'll have to return it without being seen when people are almost definitely actively looking for it. She'll worry about that tomorrow, she supposes. Lastly, she opens her closet and rifles through it to find the oversized jacket her parents got her a year ago. She's lucky she never grew into it like they said she would – it's just big enough that she's almost completely obscured when she puts the hood on, without being too inconvenient. For once she's glad she didn't throw this away when she bought her new jacket. She stuffs it inside the backpack too. Finally, with all that settled, she walks out of her room and down the stairs to leave for Aura's place.
Ehn/PC 10/21/2023 10:20 PM
Her parents' car pulls into the driveway as she leaves the house.
Ashley Laurier 10/21/2023 10:24 PM
Oh well. Being seen leaving isn't too bad since there's no way they know where she's going, and it's better than them getting home while she was still preparing. She breaks into a run away from the house just so they can't intercept her.
Ehn/PC 10/21/2023 10:33 PM

Ehn/PC 10/25/2023 3:34 PM

Ashley Laurier 10/25/2023 4:22 PM
Alright, the two of them should be able to make that. Now she just has to… actually explain what's going on. First of all, it IS possible I could just tell the truth and have her believe it. Aura herself was the one I demonstrated those superpowers on, back in the church when– The taste of that fish reenters her mouth through memory, and her hand shoots to her mouth to push back another wave of nausea. Okay, maybe don't think about that. The point is, she has an actual reason to believe me. But not even I know what Ehn really wants with the two of us in Avengard, and there's probably a pretty good chance that it'd freak Aura out to know her trip to this city is because of some stranger with unknown intentions. If we're doing this together, it's me she's choosing to trust, so I have to be the one in control of the situation. Why would I want to take her to Avengard myself, though? It's not like I'd have thought of this idea if Ehn didn't put it in my head. I guess I could just tell her that I know someone there who can help us, couldn't I? It'd make it seem like my own idea, and it IS technically true… but… No, I can't tell her that either. Every time I've come to her saying I want to help, she's always pushed me away. Aura doesn't want my help – or maybe she just doesn't trust that I can do anything for her, and… in the position she's in, it's not hard to imagine why she'd think that. Then what am I supposed to tell her? Is there any reason I'd go back there without something to get out of it like this? The only thing waiting for me there would be— …Maybe that's what I'll go with. Not that I'd ever tell her too much about it, but if I'm going there anyways, it should at least be because it's supposed to matter to me. "Hey, Aura, can I show you someplace today?" (edited)
Ehn/PC 10/25/2023 4:27 PM
"…Huh?"
Ashley Laurier 10/25/2023 4:41 PM
"It's just- It's a place that means a lot to me. And I… I wanted to show you, and maybe talk about it with you, and we could catch up with each other while we're there." Her eyes feel glued to the ground out of embarrassment, even just giving this vague description.
Ehn/PC 10/25/2023 4:46 PM
Aura looked at Ashley slowly. "Why… are you trying to be my bestie again?" (edited)
Ashley Laurier 10/27/2023 8:06 PM
Yeah, she figured she'd have to justify that at some point. She didn't expect the question to come up so early, but she's absolutely got an answer for it. "I just feel bad for you." That much is true, anyway. "It's not like I've wanted to leave you behind these past few days, it's just- I was- …There's been a lot of stuff that's been hard for me to figure out. It feels like a lot of the time, I don't know how to help you. And I- I don't even know how to convince a lot of people that it's the right thing to do… including you, sometimes. Not that I mean that in a bad way!" Her next sentence fails to come out of her mouth, and she falters for a few seconds before clearing her throat and taking a deep breath. "I just think… I think it's been hard and confusing for the both of us. And right now, the only thing I know for certain is that I don't want to give up, despite- despite everything. I want to keep trying to come back to you even when it's hard, because that's what you deserve." She hesitates again. What was the point of her saying this? Oh, right! "So, this is me trying to make it up to you. Yeah."
Ehn/PC 10/27/2023 8:08 PM
Aura suddenly pulls Ashley into a tight hug. "I’m… So happy to hear that. That’s what I love so much about you, Ashley. You’re so motivated, and you never give up. Even when the world tells you to… You’re like a superhero in real life!"
Ashley Laurier 10/27/2023 9:08 PM
An awkward half-noise comes out of her mouth as she's pulled against Aura. Quickly, she adjusts and accepts the hug so that her friend doesn't think anything's wrong. "Ah… Th-thanks…" Did that actually cheer her up that much? I mean, I'm happy about that, but… It just doesn't feel like… It doesn't feel 'right', does it? That your empty words mean this much to her. Doesn't she deserve someone better than this? Someone who actually knows what they're doing, who can help her for real? All you're doing is letting her cling onto your hollow reassurances because she doesn't have anything else. This is probably the most love she's felt in her whole life, and you don't even mean it. If you really cared, you'd have told her by now that you're lying to her. You're only doing this because it makes you feel better about yourself – so you can pretend you're trying, because you showed her the bare minimum of compassion. She's going to figure it out eventually whether you tell her or not. Because it's obvious. Maybe she's already figured it out, even. The least you could do is save her the trouble of having to leave you herself. Why can't you just tell her already? Ashley doesn't say anything.
Ehn/PC 10/27/2023 9:10 PM
"No problem!" Aura smiles. "Anyaway… What did nya want to show me?"
Ashley Laurier 10/27/2023 9:40 PM

Ehn/PC 10/27/2023 9:41 PM
"O-Oh… Isn’t that far?"
Ashley Laurier 10/27/2023 9:58 PM

Ehn/PC 10/27/2023 10:01 PM

Ashley Laurier 10/27/2023 10:20 PM

Ehn/PC 10/27/2023 10:22 PM

Ashley Laurier 10/27/2023 10:26 PM

Ehn/PC 10/27/2023 10:27 PM

Ehn/PC 10/28/2023 11:30 PM

Ashley Laurier 10/28/2023 11:35 PM
Instinct drives her to suck in her breath without even processing it, a chill running down her spine. It'd just be cruel at this point to move her. It's just a matter of time. It's just a matter of time. The only movement Ashley makes is turning her head to stare out the window at nothing.
Ehn/PC 10/28/2023 11:37 PM

Ashley Laurier 10/28/2023 11:43 PM

8:31 AM

8:31 AM
They both blow up and the world moves on. Specifics are irrelevant.
8:32 AM
All of this feels like an afterthought, really. These 2 just needed to be out of the story. Who cares?

8:33 AM
Do you simply have no faith in me?
8:34 AM
Autumn Peterson walked down the streets of Other Town, alone as usual.
8:34 AM
What?
8:36 AM
She waved to passerbys, giving them her usual and unceasing smile. She makes it look natural. They're used to it. It'd be far stranger to see her ever not smile. She's supposed to be happy, after all. She doesn't like to fail at that.
8:38 AM
Her greeting offers no real warmth, though. Were someone to somehow read her mind, all they'd find is an unceasing pool of paranoia right now. It's a good thing that sort of thought can be easily dispelled for her, otherwise that fear might haunt her too.
8:39 AM
None of the people waving back at her offer any warmth, either. They don't particularly care about her either. Most might find her annoying. Pretentious. No one particularly cares about Autumn Peterson. It's just a trade. No one wants to come off as rude here.
8:42 AM
It's not her they care about offending, though. It wouldn't really be a problem, she clearly suffers from too much kindness already. All around her is an endless entourage of enablers. She's a popular young woman, in other words.
8:43 AM
But all of these stem from 1 root cause. One that has absolutely nothing to do with her. Her parents.
8:43 AM
That is a ridiculous thing to canonize this late. She's clearly been established as having many friends.
8:44 AM
Am I to believe police officers are somehow highly popular people?
8:46 AM
They're the only 2 cops working in this small town, and valued members of this community. Naturally, everyone wants her family to like theirs. The chances of getting in trouble with the police grow drastically lower.
8:47 AM
That is a quite poor explanation at best. Are you trying to sabotage this too? I thought you'd at least bother keeping up the pretense.
8:48 AM
Or is that how they feel? It doesn't really matter. None of her friends are real characters in this story and none of them will ever need to bother explaining how they truly feel.
8:49 AM
The point here is that most relevant people think this, including her. And that's all that matters right now.
8:50 AM
You're simply leaving this ambiguous? It was my understanding that the intention here was to remove ambiguity? (edited)
8:51 AM
Autumn reaches the end of the road. She's not sure why she came here. There's nothing waiting here for her. No one on her way went to offer something to her, either. There's nothing here.
8:52 AM
As she turns around to walk back, a voice calls out to her. "Autumn?"
8:53 AM
Thomas Nielsen walks up to her. He's a few years older than her, not that it really matters.
8:54 AM
Autumn's expression tenses up, but it's unnoticeable to him. She's practiced at hiding that sort of thing.
8:56 AM
"Have you seen Aurora?" Thomas. "Why would I know where she is? Go ask Ashley if you care so much about pretending." Autumn snapped.
8:57 AM
"Pretending?" Thomas looks confused. "Pretending you care." Autumn shrugged.
8:58 AM
"Pretending I care about... Pretending?" Thomas. "Are you stupid or something? Pretending you care about her." Autumn.
9:01 AM
"She's my sister. Why wouldn't I?" Thomas doesn't display any real anger, just his usual resignation. "Yes, you adopted a brat any reasonable person would hate. Pretending she's your sister is part of what I'm saying. You just want a nice little object to protect and pretend you're anything but a total piece of shit." Autumn fumes.
9:02 AM
"Why are you acting like this? ...Never mind, I don't really care." Thomas. "Oh, that's nice. Go ahead and act like that the second I call out your obvious bullshit. My point isn't undone by your little act." Autumn.
9:03 AM
Thomas sighs. "...Fine, I'll go. I don't want to put up with whatever this is. There's the honesty you apparently want to look for. Where's Ashley?" "How should I know?" Autumn.
9:06 AM
"Because she's always at your waist? You could just text her to ask." Thomas. "Not anymore." Autumn shrugged. "I got rid of her."
9:09 AM
"What? Why?" Thomas. "Because she's the worst. You know it too. I shouldn't need to elaborate on that to you. Or are you just jealous I'm getting in the way of your half-baked rivalry? Oh no, Ashley... Listen to my tragic backstory about nothing happening. Isn't it exactly like you? Please care so much about how much I hate you." Autumn spoke mockingly, but it didn't sound that different from her usual sweet voice. Just enough to be noticeable.
9:11 AM
"What the fuck is your problem? What are you talking about?" Thomas. Autumn looked embarassed momentarily. "The point is, we're done. I'm never talking to her again." (edited)
9:13 AM
"...She's the worst because she tries to be like you. I just gave her a warning." Thomas. "So what? It doesn't matter which of us you're crushing on. I'm way out of your league." Autumn's expression frowned, even if her smile tried to disagree.
9:15 AM
Thomas doesn't bother pointing out how stupid that accusation is, but does obviously note it. He's not a pedophile, thankfully. "I thought you were dating her, anyway?" "Her personality and she's a girl? Are you stupid?" Autumn seethes as her smile fully returns.
9:17 AM
Thomas turns around and starts to walk away. Finally, he turns back around. "...Is this about Sam?" "What?" Autumn dies inside, as usual. "Oh... Right. You saw that."
9:19 AM
Thomas just nods solemnly. "Yeah." "I was just messing with him, anyway. Who cares? It was a joke. A common joke between friends. Of a platonic nature." Autumn.
9:25 AM
Thomas stares at her silently. "...Sure. Okay." He starts to regret asking. "And even if it was real, so what? What do you care? Are you jealous of him? Or wait... I get it. You're jealous of me, aren't you? You're one of those gays too, right? That's why you asked. I saw that terrible attempt at flirting too, you know? It was so forced me and Sam laughed at you about it for hours, like what a loser you know? What kind of pathetic man tries so hard to get with such a boring and bland boy. Like what, do you like pretending someone finally loves you? Or are you still convinced your parents aren't faking it? Huh? Who's embarrassed now?" Autumn.
9:25 AM
"...You, probably." Thomas isn't a gay pedophile, either. Autumn groans and turns around.
9:28 AM
"...Thanks for nothing. Let me know if you see her, I'm worried." Thomas starts to walk away. "...Yeah, I'm sure she'd immediately fall into a woodchipper without you. Everyone neeeeds you so much. I bet the world really relies on your shoulders. It's a shame bad things still happen to everyone, though... You must be so bad at that job." Autumn.
Ehn/PC 11/6/2023 9:38 AM
Thomas doesn't react. "My life is a paradise, you know!? I live in a world where everyone loves me, and you think I'd go and bother keeping around Ashley Laurier!? I'm not the kind of person who falls for stockholm syndrome! I have absolutely no feelings for that horrible annoying manipulative little... Ugh... The point is I don't care! I live my life with endless happiness you can't even imagine! You wish you were as good of a person as me, because then you wouldn't have to live in your miserable little life where you hang around Aura like she's worth helping! And at that point, why don't you just kill yourself? You don't deserve that escape yet, but what do you care? You're so selfish, you'd probably do that long before you bothered actually helping anyone! Lucky you! I guess your life isn't really that hard, huh?" Autumn.
9:38 AM

9:47 AM

9:58 AM
He finally stops walking. "I get it. You're lonely. I talked to you, now you need to keep throwing yourself at me until I fix that. See? Not stupid. But I don't have time for this. Go find someone who cares about this. I'm going to assume that's not your parents." "You're trying to prove you're not stupid to me?" Autumn. 9:59 AM

Avengard / ashley-laurier
Ehn/PC 10/31/2023 9:58 AM
Ashley wakes up on a bench, but not a bus bench. A city bench. The sky clearly shows that it’s nighttime, far past when she set her alarm. Separated by a single metal bar of anti-homeless architecture is Aura, who seems to be slowly waking up too. The city of Avengard is in close walking distance, but they’re clearly in the slightly separated rich town of Shelk.
Ashley Laurier 11/2/2023 8:31 PM
"...Wha...?" Oh. Oh, for fuck's sake. Of all times, this has to happen to her now? What even happened - did she sleepwalk off the bus into this random other city? No, that would be insane. So, what, did Aura bring her here? That's the only reasonable explanation, right? She rummages through the pockets of both her coat and backpack to make sure nothing's missing from either.
Ehn/PC 11/2/2023 8:46 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/6/2023 9:45 PM

If I get out of this, I'm never trusting that thing again. But I can't have a conversation with it when Aura's around. Shit, that's right – Aura's here too. I can't waste time trying to strategize around Ehn when I've got her to deal with. How am I going to get her to stay through this with me when it's already nighttime? I guess we couldn't go back home now even if we wanted to. Maybe Ehn did that on purpose and it'll give all my stuff back when I finish doing whatever it is it wants from me. I don't even have my knife, how am I going to- No, focus on Aura. Just focus on her for right now. She casts a cautious glance over at her friend. (edited)
Ehn/PC 11/6/2023 9:47 PM

Ehn/PC 11/6/2023 9:59 PM

Ehn/PC 11/6/2023 10:10 PM

Ehn/PC 11/7/2023 3:56 PM
Ashley can’t find anyone, even as someone approaches her and stands right next to her. It takes this person talking to finally make Ashley realize she might be blind. "Ash…ley?" The voice sounds strangely familiar, but Ashley can’t place who’s it is immediately.
Ashley Laurier 11/7/2023 6:18 PM
She focuses on staring in any other direction than at the person. Who's Ashley? She's not Ashley. She wouldn't have any reason to recognize anyone here.
Ehn/PC 11/7/2023 6:41 PM
"Great. Ignore me. Is that the trend for everyone now?"
Ashley Laurier 11/7/2023 9:16 PM
There's no getting out of this, huh. Just for one day, I wish things could go right. One day is all I'm asking for. She awkwardly, slowly turns her head to face the one talking to her.
Ehn/PC 11/7/2023 9:18 PM
It's your old friend. "...It really is you. Huh."
Ashley Laurier 11/9/2023 9:06 PM
Ashley's hands instinctively ball up into fists, which she quickly folds behind her back. No. This girl can't be a part of her life. She'd sooner leave everyone she knows behind and go die alone than admit any association. Luckily, that leaves her with pretty much only one option. "Sorry, I think you might be confusing me with somebody else?"
Ehn/PC 11/9/2023 9:07 PM
"Do you seriously think I'm going to fall for that?"
Ashley Laurier 11/9/2023 9:32 PM
If she runs away here, she doesn't know if she'll make it back to Aura. She'd definitely have run away by now if not for the possibility that losing Aura could mean losing the chance to solve any of her problems. And, as much as she wants to, she can't just outright attack someone in the middle of a city. Reluctantly, a situation like this forces her to acknowledge how useful that invisibility jacket would've been. The only thing she can do is try to keep up the act and hope Sophie gets the message. If worse comes to worst, she could try to head back to Aura and yell at her to run, but being caught in any number of ways isn't something she wants to risk... yet. "Uh, I'm not sure what you mean." Her visible discomfort isn't something she even needs to fake. "I don't know you."
Ehn/PC 11/9/2023 9:39 PM
"Oh, is that what this is? Am I too far below you now? Did you graduate from the bottom rung to the top and now poor little Sophie's too fucking meaningless for you? I see how it is, you stuck up fucking prick." She rolls her eyes. "I bet you got the biggest laugh out of ditching us, huh? Did you come back to visit us like it's a goddamn a zoo? Keep dreaming, bitch. Maybe I didn't get to run off like I'm better than everyone else but I'll still never consider you as anything but the worst of us. Did you think we'd like you, sitting off in the corner nodding your head at what everyone else did while you pretended you were hot shit just 'cause we gave you the bare minimum of our attention? You're such a fucking creep, Ashley. God... Fuck you. What gave you the right to be the lucky one?" She kicks the ground.
Ashley Laurier 11/9/2023 10:04 PM
Ashley puts on a smile so strained that it barely fits the definition of one. "I didn't want to come here in the slightest. You're the one who came up to me. I'm not going to pretend to like you, and you're obviously not interested in doing so for me, so maybe you could just leave me alone?" She can't just outright attack someone in the middle of a city. Ehn/PC 11/9/2023 10:05 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/9/2023 11:24 PM

Ehn/PC 11/10/2023 12:00 AM

Ashley Laurier 11/10/2023 12:08 AM

Ehn/PC 11/10/2023 12:53 AM

Ashley Laurier 11/10/2023 12:58 AM

Ashley Laurier 11/10/2023 9:29 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/10/2023 10:36 PM

Ehn/PC 11/10/2023 10:38 PM

Ehn/PC 11/11/2023 6:26 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/11/2023 7:05 PM
She barely stops herself from screaming. Why the fuck did that thing tell her to come here if it wasn't going to give her anything? Did it really just send her out here to fuck with her?? The second she comes back from Avengard empty-handed, it's not just over for Aura – it's probably over for her too. What the hell is she supposed to do to get Ehn to show up? Her backpack didn't even have enough in it to run away with if she still had it. That's probably long gone by now... Is she never going to get her phone back, then? Aaaaagggh, don't think about that. There has to be something she can do. Back in Other Town, Ehn couldn't leave until she got out of the forest since that wasn't 'how it worked', so does it have to do with proximity? ...Proximity to what, though? It might be about the sheer number of people to overhear in a city like this, but then how would Sam be in regular contact with it in this crowded city? Plus, it told me it'd let me know what to do once I got there, so it must've been confident in being able to talk to me even in a place with a lot of people. Then, is it about whether I'm with Aura, since that's what it needed to happen for this whole Avengard idea to work? Should I just straight-up try to call it in front of her? Coming off as a lunatic is probably better than accomplishing nothing. After carefully convincing herself to not bang her head into the wall, Ashley decides to walk back in Aura's direction.
Ehn/PC 11/11/2023 7:08 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/11/2023 9:37 PM
She nods. Then, she opens her mouth to explain what she's about to do. ...She closes her mouth again. I am never getting used to this. No amount of Ehn showing up could ever make her accustomed to explaining that she has superpowers in real life without instinctively knowing she'll come off as completely delusional. Even if it's Aura, who's more inclined to playing pretend than anyone else she knows, she could never get herself to risk that. She tries to take a deep breath and think of how to spin this.

Ehn/PC 11/12/2023 1:06 AM
"Oh… I can understand that. You must’ve been really brave, huh?"
Ashley Laurier 11/12/2023 2:24 AM
"Heh, yeah, I guess I was." God. Fuck you fuck you fuck you. Kill yourself. "When I was here… there was this awful group of kids. They didn't go out of their way to bully anyone or anything, but they were always saying these really nasty, hateful things. They were pretty clearly bigoted in a lot of ways." Yeah, you'd know, wouldn't you. Why are you even telling her this? What good does it do you? She clearly already thinks you're such an upstanding and honest person anyways. "I obviously didn't hang around them myself, but I used to… have a friend who did. Red flag, I know, but I used to think she wasn't as bad as them." Uh huh. "I never saw her acting out the way they did, only chasing after their approval, and I thought it made her different from them. 'She's not doing anything wrong,' I told myself. 'All she wants is to make a few friends, and she just happened to pick the wrong people.' I used to think I could fix her, ahaha." You didn't even TRY to distinguish yourself from them. Even in the beginning, it wasn't some kind of honest mistake. You knew what you were doing, and you took pleasure in doing it, you lying sack of shit. "So I kept my faith in her. Even as she kept nodding her head along with the terrible stuff they'd say, I didn't give up talking to her, because I thought eventually she'd just realize and turn herself around." It's not even like you just passively agreed with them. That'd be one thing. You went out of your fucking way to back them up on things, and you spouted the same horrible fucking bullshit they did because you ENJOYED it, not because anyone was telling you to. This disgusting fucking victim fantasy aside, even your 'friend' here would've been a better person than you in this situation. Think about that, huh? You literally won't even tell her what you did from your hypothetical observer's position because you're too much of a selfish fucking coward. All of this has to be about you, it all has to fit into your pretty perfect image, or else they'd realize how much you deserve to kill yourself as much as you already know you do. You should've gone through with it back then, just before you were about to move away. It would've been a proper ending. Instead you ran away to that quiet little town and wormed your way into a second chance out of the kindness of others' hearts. And you've abused that kindness over and over again. Autumn was right about you: you really did move there just to poison them all and drag them down with you. It's all you ever do. It'd be too good for you to leave this place alive a second time. But you'll get away with it, like you always do, because you're Ashley Laurier. "...And... eventually I realized I just couldn't. Every time I'd try to talk her out of it, she'd shut me down, and I eventually had to understand that- that it was her choice to be with those people. There was no way she didn't know the kind of people they were, and she still decided to stick with them, never so much as branching out to any other, nicer kids. I learned... that clinging to bad people just makes you a bad person y-yourself." Ashley notices her voice wavering. Is she about to cry? Really? She rubs at her eyes, still staring at the class picture. "My mental health got pretty horrible by the end of middle school. I was getting pulled out of classes by the teachers, I couldn't deal with it all, I just... I thought there was no hope for the rest of my life." "...But then we decided to move. And it was really weird, and really, really f-fucking scary... And I met you, and Autumn. And you two showed me I could still have friends like a normal person... and live like a normal person... and love like a normal person. So..... th-thanks, I guess..." That little speech deserved an acting award. Bravo, truly. So convincing, and so sincere. She's run out of things to say. (edited)

Ehn/PC 11/12/2023 5:46 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/12/2023 6:36 PM
"Of course it's her fault!" Ashley decides to sit down beside her. "Whether she wanted you or not, it's no excuse for the type of things she does to you. Loving someone means you support them to be the best version of themself, not punish them for what you hate about them. All I've ever seen your mom do is take out her anger on you. You deserve someone better than that."
Ehn/PC 11/12/2023 6:37 PM

I don't know how to handle this, I don't want to make her feel bad… "Just- Just because I already have a future girlfriend doesn't mean I'll love you any less for it." Wow, amazing job. Very subtle. Ehn/PC 11/12/2023 7:02 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/12/2023 7:37 PM

I want to help you in any way I can, because you do deserve people who look out for you and treat you with love and respect. I'm sure if you're looking for a girlfriend, you'll still find someone who really appreciates and understands you." She swallows. "Honestly, I mean, I genuinely try my best, but… you can do a lot better than me, I'm sure." "But if I care about you, that means I can't lie to you. I'm not gonna lead you on with a false hope just to hurt you even more later. That's why I have to be honest that my heart belongs to Autumn."
Ehn/PC 11/12/2023 7:37 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/12/2023 8:11 PM
Ah. Her heart sinks, even as she feels the weight of the conversation lift off her shoulders. She's sure she can reassure Aura in the morning anyways, so it's not a big deal... but it still feels wrong. I'm going to find a way to fix this tomorrow, or I'm never making it back to Autumn again. No, not just her. I won't see anyone I love ever again, because I'll kill myself here. That's my promise on Aura's behalf. Ashley decides to spend the night blankly staring at the walls of her old school until she loses consciousness.

Ehn/PC 11/25/2023 5:36 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/25/2023 7:32 PM
She's not sure that she wants to hear this idea. You're the one who asked. You could've just left it alone. "...Yeah?"
Ehn/PC 11/25/2023 7:35 PM
"Well… I’m scared here. And you promised you’d care for me, so…" She pauses awkwardly. "…Could you think for me? So I don’t make mistakes that would make you hate me? Or ruin what you’re planning?"
Ashley Laurier 11/25/2023 8:26 PM
Ashley feels her heart skip a beat as she becomes dimly aware of her fingernails digging into her palms. It takes a moment to register that it's not a taunt – that Aura would never mean to say something like that with the intent of getting under her skin, even if she did have all the context, which she obviously doesn't. Even then, I'm the last person who would be capable of handling a responsibility like that. "Aura, I really do want to do whatever I can to help you, but I already have feelings for-..." She trails off. Is this request really that different from what she's already been trying to do? There's no part of her that seriously wants to entertain the idea of thinking for Aura, but it'd certainly be more convenient if she could just get her to go along with her plans. It's not a responsibility she could accept for the rest of her life, but it's one she could maybe manage just for this trip into the city. She'll be so much better off without this shitty attempt at manipulating her feelings. Why are you even considering this? You're trying to help her, not give her more baggage to unpack once she's strong enough to cut ties with you. If you had any respect for her or yourself, you'd have known better than to let it get to this point. "...Can I... Can I think about it for a bit first?"
Ehn/PC 11/25/2023 8:26 PM
"O-Okay." She backs away.
Ashley Laurier 11/25/2023 8:40 PM
Right now, Ashley can't even look at her. "Actually, do you mind if I step away for a few minutes? Sorry, it's just... I think better alone. About things like this. You're fine staying here, right?"
Ehn/PC 11/25/2023 8:40 PM
"Yeah, sure."
8:40 PM
"I can wait, Nyashley!"
Ashley Laurier 11/25/2023 9:29 PM
"Alright... thanks." Okay. She's speed-walking out of the lobby, down one of the hallways she hates, towards the old classrooms that hate her. The silence which now fills the building is calm only in the worst way; it's the type of quiet that shames her, leaving her with nobody but herself to relive the weight of her actions. The life she tried to leave behind. She's an uninvited guest walking down the aisle of the funeral she created. All her willpower barely stops her from trying to look through every room she passes for any evidence of her crimes. Finally, she decides to walk inside one of the classrooms. It's a random one with no real significance to her, aside from that one girl she had a crush on but never spoke to. She waits for a few minutes in silence just to confirm to herself that there's really nobody else around at all, for whatever reason some other person would decide to trespass inside an abandoned school building today. (edited)
Ehn/PC 11/25/2023 9:30 PM
"Ashley! There you are!" Ehn appears through a wall.
Ashley Laurier 11/25/2023 9:54 PM
The initial shock is one she's almost grateful for this time. "Fucking- Where were you?!"
Ehn/PC 11/25/2023 9:56 PM
"Where was I? Where were you!? I checked several times at the bus station and you never showed up! I've got a busy schedule, I don't appreciate having to waste my time scrambling to find you in the middle of some abandoned school!"
Ashley Laurier 11/25/2023 10:12 PM
So it actually has to follow me around in physical space to meet with me? Which would mean it can't just teleport. For something that grants these supernatural abilities, that's a weird limitation… Maybe there really is some insane scientific explanation for all of this, somehow. "Whatever- Wait, so you didn't cause that?? I got my shit stolen by some random guy you didn't even account for?!" The dread already threatening to overwhelm her takes an even stronger hold on her heart.
Ehn/PC 11/25/2023 10:12 PM
"How could I possibly want that? Do you think I just have the time to monitor every potential bus thief on the planet or do you think my world revolves around you?"
Ashley Laurier 11/25/2023 10:20 PM
"You're a magic talking cat that gives people superpowers- Oh my god." She buries her face in her hands. "Can the person you wanted me to meet with help me get my phone back? I can't- I can't just head back home without the stuff I brought…"
Ehn/PC 11/25/2023 10:23 PM
"I'm still not a cat! I am Ehn!" She sighs. "Probably not. That sounds like a lot of work for someone to spend on you immediately after they meet you. You could go file a police report I guess, if you feel like meeting all of Aura's mom's coworkers." She groans overly annoyedly. "She'll be in the mayor's office."
Ashley Laurier 11/26/2023 4:02 PM
I mean, maybe I can buy a new one with the allowance I've saved up? Fuck, that's going to cost so much, though… I definitely won't have enough, damn it…! How do I get the money to pay for it? Should I sell something? Should I beg my mom and dad? No, they wouldn't listen anyway. Should I- Agh, I don't have time for this! "Who's- You mean the person who can help me? What does she look like? What's her name?"
Ehn/PC 11/26/2023 4:05 PM
"Her name is Lelouch Maoziwam. Black hair. Black everything. Looks all emo. She’ll probably be talking about women's rights when you find her."
Ashley Laurier 11/26/2023 4:25 PM
"Lelouch Maoziwam... Alright." Is she the 'Lelouch' that Sophie was complaining about? I can't imagine there's more than one person around here with a name like that. Despite never having a reason to visit, she remembers the city's layout enough that she can probably find her way to the mayor's office herself. Better than spending any more time trying to get information out of Ehn. She'd much rather take her chances with someone apparently vocal about women's rights. "You know, if this all goes to shit, you probably won't ever hear from me again. I hope you accounted for that, with the way you like to act as if you know me so well."
Ehn/PC 11/26/2023 4:27 PM

Ashley Laurier 11/26/2023 4:39 PM
Sigh. Whatever. Of course even that thing had a limit to pretending it cared. She didn't expect any comfort from her delusions anyway. Ashley walks through the door, once again leaving behind all the rooms filled with nothing, and heads back to where she left Aura.

Ashley Laurier 11/26/2023 8:10 PM
She smiles in spite of herself. "Full steam ahead works for me." It's hard not to be at least a little cheered up by Aura's demeanor, even when her life feels like it's going to collapse at any second. It reminds her of what things were like only a week ago, when it was easier to be optimistic. Maybe things weren't that great then either, but at least they weren't spiraling completely out of control. But that's a lie. Your life was always like this; you just didn't notice until it was too late. All you did was let yourself believe in a fantasy at the expense of those who needed you. It was always going to turn out this way... and the sooner you accept that, the sooner you can actually do something about it. Ashley continues walking. (edited)

Ashley Laurier 12/16/2023 7:15 PM
She bites her lip hard enough to make it bleed, not any longer for the purpose of hurting herself, but to cut off her involuntary urge to scream. But she can't hold herself back. "As if they even care!" she shouts, her voice cracking. "They wouldn't come for me even if I was dead!" (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/16/2023 7:20 PM

Ashley Laurier 12/16/2023 9:10 PM

Ehn/PC 12/16/2023 9:12 PM

Ehn/PC 12/17/2023 11:36 AM

Dana Craig started a thread. 12/22/2023 12:15 AM
Ehn/PC
"What do you have that I don’t!? What makes you better than me!?" She looked at Ashley with pure hatred. "You don’t deserve that love! I was a good person! I helped people! And you- And you just had it handed to you while you hurt everyone around you! What makes you better than me, Ashley Laurier!?" She looks like she’s about to cry.
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 3:43 PM
"No!" That pathetic, solitary word is all she can muster in response at first, as though it could stop all this through her willpower alone – as though she could erase this problem by denying it. "You're- I'm not- That's not true at all! I'm…" Struggling for a moment to find the words, thoughts racing through her head so quickly it feels like it'll split open, she finally decides on what to say. "Autumn, I've… I've never met someone who deserves all the good things in the world as much as you do. But if life hasn't been kind to you, it doesn't make you unworthy of that kindness. It doesn't make you worse. It's just another reason our world is so shitty and unfair." "I-… Me being alive right now, that's not because I deserved it. In a good world, I probably wouldn't have a reason to exist. But I want to spend whatever time I have making up for all those wrongs." For the first time in this conversation, she looks at Autumn with a nervous but firm expression. "If I could somehow just give you all the love I've gotten in my life, I'd do it faster than in a heartbeat. If there's any way I can fill your life with the love you deserve, that must be my purpose. As long as I'm alive, that recompense is what I exist for."
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 3:47 PM
"Are those words yours? …Or did I put them there?" She looks at Ashley, insultingly.
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 4:19 PM
"They're what I believe, from my heart. Maybe it came from me, or you, or anyone else… but I think it's just always been true, and that's what matters." She quickly realizes how pretentious that sounds. "Um- I mean, I'm not actually trying to copy anyone. It's just what I think." (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 4:24 PM

Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 6:21 PM
....... Ashley stares as her expression twists in some combination of shock and sorrow. She'd always pretty much expected this was going to happen, yeah. It's just weird that this is really it. If anyone could've saved her, it was Autumn. "...I'm sorry."
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 6:27 PM

Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 6:37 PM

Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 6:39 PM

Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 7:00 PM
"Yeah... I know." Why is she smiling like that?? She tries to avert her gaze, as if it was somehow bothering Autumn.
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 7:03 PM
"I. Win. Like I’ve always deserved." Autumn. Ashley’s gaze is averted to Thomas, who grabs the gun of the last officer in the room, pistol whips him to knock him out, and then shoots Autumn in the back. He does all of this with a miserable expression. "Agh." Autumn falls over.
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 8:05 PM
No. An energy fiercer than anything she's ever felt in her life – let alone today – fills up her body before she can even begin to think. All of the blood and organs in her body are replaced by poison- no, fire, lightning, liquid plasma rising up through her lungs and choking her. As soon as her mind catches up, she wishes more than anything in the world that it hadn't. 'Too much' would be an understatement so vile and infuriating, it would make her want to die even more than every instinct in her body shrieking at her to explode, to tear off her burning skin to at least distract her from the hell within her mind. And she'd act on it if only every instinct outside of her body wasn't telling her to DO SOMETHING, to stop this with some power to solve this situation she knows she doesn't have, she knows she's never had, but it doesn't matter if she does. All that matters is that she needs to. She needs this not to be real. She needs to have some way to fix this. SHE NEEDS TO DO SOMETHING. The horrible, irreconcilable, agonized force inside of her throws her against the bars, clearly not concerned with her physical body slamming into them hard enough that it feels like she's about to lose consciousness too. A sound that Autumn's beautiful ears don't deserve to hear explodes out of her, wailing as though she was the one who was- who was- Stop it! Stop it! Stop it!! Stop it! Stop it!!! STOP!!!!! Her pleading hands claw for Autumn's body, towards the spot where she's fallen. She needs to hold her. Maybe everything can be okay if she just holds her. Maybe everything can stop for just one moment if she could only hold her.
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 8:07 PM
Autumn crawls away towards the elevator in a panic. Thomas watches her leave without saying anything.
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 8:49 PM
Ashley can't be quite so silent. Her voice still filling the room with grief and agony, she desperately grabs at the floor where Autumn was, the air that once held her. She can't even hold her in her last moments? Ashley Laurier really is completely powerless. All she can do is feel the tears streaming across her face like lava, blocking out the girl she so desperately needs to see one last time as her chest heaves and her darkest thoughts threaten to wither her brain inside her skull.
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 8:53 PM
Thomas walks up to Ashley and holds the gun out towards her. "…You win, Ashley."
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 9:01 PM
As swiftly and precisely as her devastated body can manage, she lurches up from the ground, snatches the gun from him, and points it at his head with both hands. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 9:04 PM
He stops her the second she tries aiming it towards him. "Not yet. I haven’t unlocked your cell yet."
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 9:07 PM
The sound of his voice makes all of the breath exit her body. Her hands are shaking, badly enough that she almost worries she's going to drop the gun. "W-W-What the fuck are you doing?? What in the fucking world is your problem??!!"
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 9:10 PM
"What the hell is yours!? You kidnapped my sister! You’re forcing my hand! No matter what happens to her ever, no one will ever believe her! No one will ever understand what my sister’s been through because you had to make everything about you! You had to play the hero no matter what! So now… My mother’s won. My sister is desperately begging for the love of a woman who’d love to watch her die because you couldn’t be her friend!"
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 9:44 PM
"I didn't-! You always assume I don't even care, but I really tried as hard as I could to help her!! The whole reason I'm here with her in Avengard in the first place is because I needed to find someone who could help her!!! But no, NO, it's always 'you kidnapped my sister'! 'You make everything about you'! If I was ever trying to make my life anything but the opposite of about myself, I wouldn't even be here. And if you didn't keep getting in my way, maybe I'd have actually been able to DO SOMETHING by now!! What the fuck are you even accomplishing with this?! No, no, I don't even want to hear you explain, fucking murderer piece of shit-!!! Let me out already!!!"
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 9:46 PM
"I never killed anyone. Autumn’s going to be fine. I'm not a psychopath like you who can so easily do that. That’s why… You win. I’m out of options. I’m going to open this cell, take you to my parents… And then you’re going to kill them. That’s… The only chance my sister has anymore." Thomas.
1
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 10:27 PM
It takes every shred of restraint in Ashley's body not to reach through the bars and attempt to strangle him to death. Thomas Nielsen needs to die for the people she cares about to be happy. If justice really does exist, that must be true. But even more than that, his parents need to die. As long as Autumn is alive, she'll leave him alive too, for however long she needs to. "Fine." She spits it out angrily like it's a curse word.
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 10:27 PM
He lets her take the gun and unlocks the cell. "…This way."
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 10:29 PM
She follows him, still holding the gun in both hands and ready to shoot him if he tries anything.
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 10:30 PM
He walks silently down a corridor. Aura’s father, in police uniform walks out of a room in front of them. "Thomas? What is she doing out with a gun?" He just watches.
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 10:49 PM
Ashley aims the gun directly at his chest and fires.
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 10:50 PM
((Roll))
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 10:50 PM
((11))
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 10:51 PM
It hits, non-lethally. He falls over in pain. "Thomas! Help me! I’m your father." Thomas just watches.
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 10:53 PM
....After freezing up for half a second, she shakes herself off and rushes straight for his body on the ground. You can't hesitate here!! With that, she points the gun downwards and shoots him in the head.
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 10:54 PM
((Roll))
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 10:55 PM
((12))
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 10:57 PM
Aura's father dies. "…One down." Thomas says dryly.
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 11:19 PM
Ashley shivers. You can't hesitate here. You can't hesitate here! Isn't this what you were always waiting for – isn't this what they deserve?! They hurt your best friend- their DAUGHTER- so badly that she's barely even herself anymore. Neither of them get to ruin their daughter's life this way and live, not when that's all they've ever done, and all they'll ever do! Come on, pick yourself up. You can handle it. Just last week, you were jumping for the chance to do something like this, and you're struggling now, of all times?! Where else can your justice be found, if not here in your hands? Deep breaths. She takes five deep breaths in and out to calm herself, then looks back to Thomas. "Where's the other?"
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 11:20 PM
Thomas silently keeps walking towards the next one.
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 11:21 PM
"…" She shivers again, but follows him anyways.
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 11:22 PM
Thomas leads her to the interrogation room. Aura is inside, being interrogated by her mother.
Ashley Laurier 12/23/2023 11:42 PM
"…Ugh!" Have either of them noticed her yet? She tries to stand outside of where they could see her, attempting to listen to what they're saying.
Ehn/PC 12/23/2023 11:42 PM
They haven’t seen her, but the door is purposely built to be soundproof.
Ashley Laurier 12/24/2023 12:02 AM
…Yeah. That makes sense. Oh boy. Another few deep breaths. It's not like she thought she could still be friends with Aura after this, anyways! It was always going to end with her cutting ties, leaving her to live a better life! So can't she just finish the job right now?! …No, she can't. Not like this. Not right in front of her friend. Ashley firmly knocks on the door to the interrogation room, making sure not to let herself be seen.
Ehn/PC 12/24/2023 12:02 AM
Aura’s mom gets up and opens the door. "Who’s there?"
Ashley Laurier 12/24/2023 12:04 AM
Ashley peeks out from behind the door, aims for Aura's mom's head, and fires.
Ehn/PC 12/24/2023 12:04 AM
((Roll))
Ashley Laurier 12/24/2023 12:05 AM
((17 ))
Ehn/PC 12/24/2023 12:07 AM
She stumbles back and crumples onto the ground lifelessly. Aura runs up to her mother's corpse and hugs it. "Mom! No! Mom… Mom, please!" (edited)
Ashley Laurier 12/24/2023 12:37 AM
"….." Hiding back behind the door, Ashley's face contorts against her will into some expression portraying at least five conflicting emotions. Her mouth moves involuntarily to try to make a sound – one that she knows better than to make if she doesn't want Aura to know who just murdered her mother in cold blood – but nothing comes out, anyways. She stares through the door's glass at Thomas, the last one she's supposed to kill. The second one she'd have to gun down right here, as her best friend is grieving one family member already. Can she really do this? Could she ever have enough willpower to do this? Ashley turns to sprint back down the hallway. She's still gripping the gun with one hand even as it trembles, even as sweat pours down her face. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/24/2023 12:41 AM
Thomas grabs her arm as soon as she tries to run. "…You forgot someone."
Ashley Laurier 12/24/2023 12:54 AM
She wordlessly tries to break free from his grip on her, hitting at his hand with the gun in her other hand. Stop it! Get off me! I can't in front of her! As if praying she'll be able to telepathically communicate with him, she screams this internally as she frantically shakes her head. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/24/2023 12:55 AM
"…Fine." He tries to just take the gun from her.
Ashley Laurier 12/24/2023 12:59 AM
Ashley throws it down the hallway, away from the two of them, and punches Thomas in the face with her now-free hand in a last desperate attempt to get away from him.
Ehn/PC 12/24/2023 1:00 AM
"…I never got her to love me." Aura. ((Roll))
Ashley Laurier 12/24/2023 1:01 AM
((16))
Ehn/PC 12/24/2023 1:02 AM
"Ugh! What the fuck is wrong with you!?" Thomas. Ashley runs away.
Ashley Laurier 12/24/2023 1:09 AM
Too much to count, that's what. She can't even think remotely straight anymore. The only thing on her mind as she runs back towards the elevator is Autumn, Autumn, Autumn, Autumn. At least Autumn has to be alive, if Thomas said she was, right? Maybe- Maybe if she can just hold her- if she can just- if everything just- aaaahhhh!!!!
Ehn/PC 12/24/2023 1:11 AM
Ashley arrives at the elevator. A strange smell is intensifying in the air, enough to mask the smell of blood.
Ashley Laurier 12/24/2023 1:13 AM
What?? What does it smell like??? Ashley frantically presses the button to open the elevator, only able to process whatever this smell is because of how jarring it is after everything. (edited)
Ehn/PC 12/24/2023 1:14 AM
((End session))
